[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting we ol i tok orait long en em ol tingting bilong Aristotle long sains (science), wantaim saikoloji (psychology).
English: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
Tok Pisin: Long ol nupela de bilong em, dispela 'show' i save kamap long redio bilong intanet TogiNet Radio, dispela em i wanpela websait we i save gat ol toktok bilong redio long en.
English: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'binary number' em i ken i gat tupela velu (value), dispela em i 0 o 1, na ol dispela namba em ol i save kolim olsem ol 'binary digit' - o 'bits' long toktok bilong komputa.
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Tok Pisin: Plis tingim olsem yu bai lukim wanpela bikpela matmat we ol i planim planti lain long en, tu dispela ples em i gat bikpela mining long planti manmeri long dispela graun.
English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
Tok Pisin: 'Great Pyramid' long Giza em i wanpela bilong ol 'seven wonders' we i sanap yet long tude.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: "Nau mipela i gat wanpela rat we i no gat sik suga moa na em i gat 4-pela mun," dispela man i tok.
predictions: Mi save kisim hamas 4-mis bilong maus we i no inap kisim diabetes, tasol bilong taim i stap, ol i save kisim diabetes, em i save addim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.
Tok Pisin: Dispela woa em bai i stap 40-pela yia na pait i kamap tru tru, long ol ami (army) we i makim ol kantri, long ol ples bilong pait long Africa i go long Asia, long Afghanistan, Cuba na planti narapela ples.
English: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
Tok Pisin: Ol i stap kol moa long ol ples we i raunim ol long san na long nait ol i hot moa long ol ples we i raunim ol.
English: Such things have become separate disciplines, which focus on providing solutions to real life problems.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain ol samting i gat wanwan eria bilong stadi bilong ol yet, na i lukluk long ol rot bilong givim ol ansa long ol problem we i save kamap long olgeta de.
English: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.
Tok Pisin: Ol risets i kamap long 'Twentieth century' i bin soim olsem i gat tupela 'pool' bilong 'genetic variation': wanpela em i hait na wanpela em i stap ples klia.
English: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.
Tok Pisin: Taim yumi skelim olgeta samting, yumi mas no ken kirap nogut sapos ol tumbuna bilong ol i stretim ol "problem bilong 'protein'" bilong ol long wankain we olsem ol 'chimps' long 'savanna' i save mekim long tude.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Dr. Ehud Ur, em i wanpela profesa bilong marasin long Dalhousie University long Halifax, long Nova Scotia na em i siaman sains na klinik seksen bilong Canadian Diabetes Association i givim tok lukaut olsem dispela risets i nupela yet.
predictions: Dr. Ehud Ur, profesa bilong mifesis long Dalhousie University long Halifax, Nova Scotia na praipela bilong klinik na sains divison bilong Canadian Diabetes Association, i kisim wanpela waring long reseach em i stil i save kam long samting bilong samting.

English: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.

English: It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks).
Tok Pisin: Em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela samting we i save pulim ol turis i go long South Africa na ol i save lukim em olsem impoten samting insait long South African National Parks (SANParks).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Large areas further north are quite sparsely populated and some is nearly uninhabited wilderness.
Tok Pisin: Ol bikpela eria longwe long not em i no gat planti manmeri na sampela ples we i no gat manmeri long en.
English: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important.
Tok Pisin: Long ol ples we i hot long Middle East, haus em i no impoten.
English: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
Tok Pisin: Sapos kantri we yu bai go long en em ol lain i tok save long sampela samting we yu mas lukaut long en, sampela senis bai kamap long 'travel health insurance' o 'trip cancellation insurance' bilong yu.
English: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
Tok Pisin: Bipo, i no olgeta Sámi i bin stap insait long wok bilong lukautim planti lain 'reindeer', tasol ol i stap long painim pis, painim abus na kain olsem, planti bilong ol i save gat 'reindeer' bilong karim kago.
English: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'German pastry' em ol i gutpela tru, na long Bavaria, ol i gat gutpela teist na i gat kainkain, wankain olsem ol dispela bilong ol lain i stap saut, ol Austria.

Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Long Mande, nambawan sekreteri bilong Nobel Commitee for Literature long Swedish Academy, i tokaut long pablik long redio progrem bilong Sveriges Radio long Sweden olsem, ol i bin no inap long toktok wantaim Bob Dylan long 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature we em bin winim, na ol i no wok long traim long toktok wantaim em.
predictions: Monti, Sara Danius, stapela siksek long Nobel Kometi long Laitara bilong Swedia Akaademi, i kisim kisim long raesi program long Sveriges Radio long Swedia, i openly anonsim long kometi, i no ken raitim Bob Dylan tasol long winnim Nobel Prize long Laitara bilong 2016, ol i laing givim up long traimim hariapim em.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i min olsem yu ken lukim siti we i gat histori bilong en long sampela de taim yu kam bek long nait na slip long sip.
English: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
Tok Pisin: Polis i tok ol i saspek olsem wanpela soldia bilong Daesh (ISIL) i kamapim dispela hevi.
English: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
Tok Pisin: Ol atoriti i ting olsem dispela i soim olsem ol dispela kontena we i holim 'uranium' long dispela senta i mas bruk na i wok long lik (leak).
English: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, lukaut long ol smel we i save pulim ol bea na ol narapela animal, olsem na no ken karim o kukim kaikai we i gat strongpela smel na mekim kem i stap klin.
English: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu ringim sampela lain we i stap tausen 'mile' longwe, yu wok long yusim wanpela 'satellite'.

label: Danius i tok, "Nau yet, mipela i no wok long mekim wanpela samting. Mi bin ring na salim ol i-meil long man i save wok wantaim em na mi bin kisim ol gutpela bekim na dispela em i inap."
predictions: Danius i tok, "Wanem taim bilong tude, mi no ken mekim wanpela samting. Mi save kisim kisim na kisim arapela samting bilong em long samting bilong wanpela samting bilong em nabaut na mi save kisim wanpela no gutpela samting bilong antap long dispela. Tasol long nait bilong tude, mi no ken mekim wanpela samting moa."

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
Tok Pisin: "Nau mipela i gat wanpela rat we i no gat sik suga moa na em i gat 4-pela mun," dispela man i tok.
English: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century.
Tok Pisin: Ol Wagonways em ol i bin bildim long England taim bipo long '16th Century'.
English: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
Tok Pisin: Planti dai i save kamap bikos ol manmeri i pilim tait long traim long swim i kam bek agensim 'current', na dispela em i hat long mekim.
English: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong wokabaut long tupela lek em ol i painim long fosil (fossil) bilong ol Australopithecus we i bin stap 4.2-3.9 milien yia i go pinis, tasol ol Sahelanthropus i bin wokabaut long tupela lek long kain taim olsem seven milien yia i go pinis.
English: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
Tok Pisin: 'Duty free shopping' em i sans long baim ol samting we yu no inap long baim takis na 'excises' long sampela lokesen.

predictions: Previou, Ring CEO, Jamie Siminoff, i save tokim em i bin kisim start long kompni bilong em tasol bikos dorbel bilong em i no inap haring long haus bilong em long garijen em i stap.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain ol pikinini em ol i save kolim ol olsem "'feral" o wel pikinini. Sampela 'feral' pikinini em sampela lain (planti taim em i papamam bilong ol yet) i save mekim ol i stap long haus tasol; long sampela taim ol papamama i no bisi long dispela pikinini bikos em i gat samting i rong long het bilong em o long bodi bilong em.
English: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.
Tok Pisin: NextGen em i wanpela sistem we FAA i tok olsem em bai larim ol balus long flai long ol sotpela rot na seivim (save) planti milien galen (gallon) bilong 'fuel' long olgeta yia na daunim mak bilong 'carbon' we i save go long 'air'.
English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
Tok Pisin: Wankain, taim yu gat wanpela Schengen visa, yu no nid long aplai long ol visa long wanwan bilong ol Schengen memba kantri, na dispela seivim taim, mani na pepawok.
English: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
Tok Pisin: Sampela taim i go pinis long dispela wik, wanpela helikopta (helicopter) i 'crash' na i kilim tripela lain na narapela tripela i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong ol.
English: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
Tok Pisin: Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, i givim wanpela tok save long moning we i tokaut olsem ol bai kotim Huhne na Pryce.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Em i wokim wanpela WiFi belo bilong dua, em i tok.
predictions: Em bilipim wanpela Waifai dor bel, em tok.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
Tok Pisin: I gat planti manmeri i stap laip yet husat i bin stap long dispela taim, na planti lain moa husat i gat ol lain we ol laikim i bin dai o ol i bin wok go na dai long hap, ol Jew na ol lain i no Jew wantaim.
English: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save long mak bilong spit i stap daunbilo moa long ol narapela seksen — planti taim em i 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — na pasin bilong bihainim ol gut em i moa impoten long sakim tok.
English: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
Tok Pisin: Ol i painimaut olsem Sun i save ol wankain bikpela tingting olsem ol narapela sta: Dispela ektiviti bilong olgeta sta long sistem em ol i painimaut olsem 'luminosity' na 'rotation' bilong ol i save mekim ol i tanim tanim, na i no gat narapela samting gen.
English: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
Tok Pisin: Apia em ol i bin kamapim em long 1850s na em i bin nambawan kapitol bilong Samoa stat long 1959 i kam inap nau.
English: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
Tok Pisin: Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, i givim wanpela tok save long moning we i tokaut olsem ol bai kotim Huhne na Pryce.

predictions: Siminoff i tok pikinini i stap na i go antap wantaim taim em i bin go bek long aksi Shark Tank long 2013, taim em i no gat fund long kisim samting bilong staplain samting bilong em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, Amazon em namba wan wara we namel bilong em i bikpela tru long Earth, na mak bilong namel bilong en em i sikspela 'mile'.
English: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol planti 'fruit pastry', na i gat ol epol we ol i wokim 'pastry' long en i save stap long olgeta taim bilong yia, na ol 'cherry pastry' na 'plum pastry' em ol i save mekim long taim bilong sama (summer).
English: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
Tok Pisin: Ol polis i tok olsem, i luk olsem draiva bilong dispela kar we i bamim dispela man bilong kisim foto bai i no inap long kisim ol sas.
English: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
Tok Pisin: Robin Uthappa i mekim nambawan sko (score) we i winim olgeta bikpela sko bilong dispela 'inning', em i mekim 70-pela 'runs' long 41-pela bal tasol taim em i paitim bal long mak bilong 11-pela foa na 2-pela siks.
English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i save wok stap olsem man o meri we i save bungim ol grup we i wok wantaim long ofis.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
Tok Pisin: Traim long swim i go long wanpela hap we 'current' i no pulim bek gen o, bihainim mak bilong yu long swim na saposl i gat lain i lukim yu, yu ken tingting long wet long ol lain i ken seivim (save) yu.
English: Cuomo, 53, began his governorship earlier this year and signed a bill last month legalizing same-sex marriage.
Tok Pisin: Cuomo, husat i gat 53 krismas, i statim wok bilong em olsem gavana long stat bilong dispela yia na i sainim wanpela 'bill' long mun i go pinis we i mekim lo i tok orait long man i maritim man yet na meri i maritim meri yet.
English: Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri i save kukim kaikai autsait long sait bilong haus; ol stoa em ol tebol we i op na i lukluk i go long rot. Ol i save yusim ol ston long bildim ol haus.
English: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
Tok Pisin: Tude planti Sámi i mekim ol wok bilong tude. Wok bilong givim sevis long turis em i save wanpela impoten rot bilong kisim mani long ol Sápmi, long Sámi eria.
English: For example, each year students from Bennet School in North Carolina design a website about their trip to the State Capital, each year the website gets remodeled, but old versions are kept online to serve as a scrapbook.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel, long wanwan yia ol sumatin long Bennet School long North Carolina i save disainim wanpela websait long raun bilong ol i go long State Capital, na long wanwan yia dispela websait i kisim nupela stail, tasol ol olpela 'version' i save stap yet 'online' olsem wanpela 'scrapebook'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
Tok Pisin: Cyanuric acid na melamine em ol i bin painim ol insait long ol 'sample' bilong pispis bilong ol 'pes' we i bin dai taim ol i kaikai dispela kaikai bilong animal we i posin insait long em.
English: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa.
Tok Pisin: Siti bilong Casablanca long tude em ol man Berber we i save painim pis i kamapim long '10th century' BCE, na ol Phoenicians, Romans, na Merenid i bin yusim olsem wanpela impoten port we ol i kolim Anfa.
English: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.
Tok Pisin: Dispela pasin em planti lain i save mekim, tasol em i kamapim 'wear' long plang wil bilong ol 'wagon'.
English: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.
Tok Pisin: Narapela opsen (option) bilong 'biorhythm-based' em bai yu dringim planti wara (kain olsem wara o ti, wanpela 'diuretic') bipo long yu slip, dispela bai fosim yu long kirap na i go pispis.
English: It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, em i no gat atoriti long senisim ol 'tax law' na ol 'tariff' namel long ol 'state'.

English: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

Tok Pisin: Long ol 'developed country' yu bai no inap long harim wankain mak bilong komplen long kwaliti bilong wara ol bris i pundaun.
English: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
Tok Pisin: 'Technological determinism' em i wanpela hap tok we i gat planti kainkain tingting we ol manmeri i save prektisim, stat long 'technology push' o 'technological imperative' i go long wanpela tingting we i tok olsem pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong graun em long bihainim ol lo bilong sains na kamapim ol teknoloji we i save bihainim ol dispela lo bilong sains.
English: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before.
Tok Pisin: Displela nupela envairomen i gat ol kainkain risos na ol kainkain kompetisen, olsem na dispela nupela populesen (population) bai nidim ol narapela pasin long kamap strong moa long mak we ol i bin stap long en bipo.
English: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
Tok Pisin: Narapela samting, sampela 'saddle', dispela em ol English 'saddle', ol i gat ol 'safety bar' we i save larim 'stirrup leather' i pundaun i go daun long 'saddle' sapos wanpela 'rider' i pundaun i go baksait.

English: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
Tok Pisin:"}]

English: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
Tok Pisin: 'Great pyramid' em ol i bin wokim long givim ona long Pharaoh Khufu, na planti ol liklik pyramid, ol 'tomb', na tempel em ol i wok long givim ona long ol meri na famili memba bilong Khufu.
English: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken lukluk gut tru long tudak wantaim 'night vision', na tu, ol i save muv isi tru. Ol 'ocelot' i save painim kaikai bilong ol taim ol i hait wantaim ol samting i stap long envairomen na kalap antap long animal we ol i laik ketsim.
English: The moisture on your hands will react with the outer layers, which will feel funny and form a sort of shell.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wara i stap long han bilong yu bai i 'react' wantaim ol 'layer' we i stap autsait, we bai i pilim narakain na kamapim wanpela kain sel.
English: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
Tok Pisin: Duvall, em i marit na em i gat tupela bikpela pikinini, na em i no mekim Miller i amamas, we dispela stori i toktok long en.

English: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools.

(Note: Tok Pisin is a creole language spoken in Papua New Guinea, and it does not have direct translations for many English words. In the translation provided, "chhappan bhog bhajan" is translated as it is, since it is a proper noun and not a common English word. However, "singer" is translated as "sangiman", which is the closest equivalent in Tok Pisin. Similarly, "accompanying" is translated as "stap wantaim", which means "staying together" in Tok Pisin.)

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain i mekim risets long Princeton University long United States na Uppsala University long Sweden i mekim ripot long wanpela nupela 'specie' we i kamap insait long tupela generesen (generation), tasol ol i ting long dispela proses (process) i kisim longpela taim moa, em i kamap bikos long 'breeding' i kamap namel long Darwin finch bilong dispela eria, Geospiza fortes, na cactus finch we i kam long narapela eria, Geospiza conirostris.
English: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol i bin mekim wanpela test we ol i kolim PALM, ZMapp i stap olsem wanpela 'control', dispela em i min olsem ol saintis i yusim em olsem wanpela 'baseline' na i skelim wanem we ol narapela tritmen i wok bihainim em.
English: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
Tok Pisin: Sapos wanpela 'rider' i pundaun long wanpela hos, tasol lek bilong em i pas long 'stirrup', hos i ken pulim ol taim em i ranawe. Long daunim mak bilong dispela hevi long kamap, ol 'rider' i mas mekim samting long abrusim dispela.
English: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.
Tok Pisin: Ol Gurani em ol impoten as ples manmeri we i stap nau long ples we ol i kolim Eastern Paraguay, na ol i save raun na pasinim abus na tu, ol i save planim kaikai long gaden.

Tok Pisin: Mausman bilong Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman i tok: "Angola i wok long go long mak we i nogut tru long dispela 'outbreak' na dispela hevi em i stap nogut tru long Angola," em i tok.

Ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i ting olsem, maski dispela em i tel bilong wanpela yangpela dainaso, dispela 'sample' i soim gras bilong wanpela bikpela dainaso na i no gras bilong wanpela pikinini dainaso.

Dispela em i stap bilong bikpela samting i save kamap long wanpela endemik dainaso, Geospiza fortes, na wanpela immigran cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

Tok Pisin: Planti ol insek i ken foldim wing bilong ol i kam pas wantaim bodi bilong ol na dispela em i gutpela samting.

Ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i ting olsem, maski dispela em i tel bilong wanpela yangpela dainaso, dispela 'sample' i soim gras bilong wanpela bikpela dainaso na i no gras bilong wanpela pikinini dainaso.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Mosasaurus was the apex predator of its time, so it feared nothing, except other mosasaurs.

English: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.

English: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i wanbel wantaim tok save bilong USOC we i tok olsem gutpela bilong ol 'athlete' na ol 'club', na ol gem bilong ol, na dispela i ken kamap taim mipela i gohet long mekim ol wok bilong mipela na mekim ol gutpela senis i kamap insait long oganaisesen, na i no rausim setifiket.
English: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

English: The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'satellite' long 'space' i kisim dispela kol (call) na salim em i kam daun bek gen, wantu tru.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

Tok Pisin: Sapos wanpela 'rider' i pundaun long wanpela hos, tasol lek bilong em i pas long 'stirrup', hos i ken pulim ol taim em i ranawe. Long daunim mak bilong dispela hevi long kamap, ol 'rider' i mas mekim samting long abrusim dispela.
English: Muhammad was deeply interested in matters beyond this mundane life. He used to frequent a cave that became known as “Hira‘” on the Mountain of “Noor” (light) for contemplation.
Tok Pisin: Muhammad i gat intres long ol samting we i bikpela moa long ol samting bilong dispela laip. Em i save go long wanpela hul bilong ston we ol i kolim olsem “Hira'” long Mountain of “Noor” (lait) long i stap na tingting.
English: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.
Tok Pisin: Long Sande, Presiden bilong United States Donald Trump, i tok insait long wanpela leta we press secretary bilong em i ritim, em i tok olsem ol soldia bilong US bai i lusim kantri Syria.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.

English: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
Tok Pisin: Namba wan namel long 78-pela rekomendesen (recommendation) em i olsem i mas i gat wanpela nupela 'diplomatic initiative' bipo long dispela yia i pinis long mekim ol boda bilong Iraq i stap seif long ol birua na kamapim ol gutpela rilesensip wantaim ol lain i stap klostu long em.

Tok Pisin: Wanpela man Filipino husat i bin wok olsem wanpela polis bipo i holimpasim ol turis bilong Hongkong taim em i kisim bas bilong ol long Manila, dispela bikpela siti bilong Philippines.
English: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
Tok Pisin: Planti ol 'research telescope' em ol i bikpela fesiliti (facilty) we i stap long ol longwe ples long ol gutpela 'atmospheric condition'.
English: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol pasin we ol lain i save mekim long dispela holide em ol lain i no Kristen na ol kantri we i no Kristen kantri i save bihainim long olgeta hap bilong graun.

predictions: Oselot i laik kisim smol animel. Em i kisim monki, snek, rat, na birda, tasol em i no kisim yet. Ol animel we oselot i kisim i save stap man bilong em.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
Tok Pisin: Europe em i wanpela kontinen (continent) we i liklik, tasol em i gat planti indipenden kantri. Planti taim, long raun i go long planti kantri em bai min olsem yu bai go insait long planti 'visa application' na 'passport control' moa long wanpela taim.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

English: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.

English: In fact, it is not easy to find at all even if one knew it existed. Once inside the cave, it is a total isolation.

predictions: Mi kisim nem long proses bilong dispela samting "speciation", em i stap long tok bilong nupela kain samting bilong sospen. Speciation em i wanpela samting bilong no ken inap mekim pasin bilong evolusen, na em i wanpela samting bilong wanpela kisim wanpela meri.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The “invisible team” is the management team to which each of the members report. The invisible team sets the standards for each member.

English: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.

English: Its all-pervading power affected everyone from king to commoner.
Tok Pisin: Dispela bikpela pawa bilong em i kamapim senis long olgeta manmeri. Stat long king na i go daun long ol manmeri nating we i no gat nem na namba.

Olgeta taim, ol i save kisim kain kain kakaruk na kain kain samting bilong kakaruk, tasol ol i save kisim samting bilong strange o unusual bilong ol i kisim wanpela kain wild boar, kisim kain kain snail, na kisim wanpela kain rat na kisim em i kisim "dormouse".

English: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
Tok Pisin: Scotturb Bus 403 i save ron olgeta taim i go long Sintra, na stop long Cabo da Roca.
English: If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu laikim sampela liklik 'pastry' we i teist nais, traim dispela ol i save kolim Berliner, Pfannkuchen o Krapfen long wanwan rijen.
English: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
Tok Pisin: Perian tok ples em i isi na grama (grammar) bilong em i isi long bihainim.
English: All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta sitisen (citizen) bilong Vatican City em ol i Roman Catholic.
English: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long The Simpsons Simon i bin wok long kainkain posisen bilong ol sampela 'show'.

English: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Bihain tasol long pait i stat, Britain i mekim wanpela 'naval blockade' long Germany.
predictions: Bilong wanem taim bilong nating bilong kros bilong ol, Britain i stap inisim naval blokade bilong Germany.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The "up bow" mark looks like a V and the "down bow mark" like a staple or a square missing its bottom side.
Tok Pisin: Dispela "'up bow" mark' i luk olsem wanpela V na dispela "'down bow mark'" i luk olsem wanpela 'staple' o wanpela 'square' i no gat aninit sait bilong em.
English: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.
Tok Pisin: Long presentesen bilong Fonde long Tokyo Game show, presiden bilong Nintendo Satoru Iwata i presentim wanpela 'controller design' bilong kampani long nupela geim (game) bilong em Nintendo Revolution.
English: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island.
Tok Pisin: Stat bilong Taiwan i kamap long '15th century' taim ol 'sailor' bilong Europe i abrusim em na i rekodim nem bilong em olsem Ilha Formosa, o naispela ailan.
English: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
Tok Pisin: Dispela muvi we Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone i stap insait long en, em ol lain i makim em long i stap insait long olgeta bikpela 'category'.
English: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
Tok Pisin: Na tu long hap not yu ken go Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), wanpela ples we olgeta lain i save long en bikos long ol stori bilong Maria mama bilong Jisas i kamap long en.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Dispela plen bilong ol em i wok gut, ol i stopim impoten saplai (supply) i go long militeri (military) na ol manmeri, maski dispela 'blokade' i brukim intanesinel lo we i bin kamap aninit long ol agrimen bilong tupela 'century' i go pinis.
predictions: Stratejin i save wokim gut, kisim kala kritikal bilong siklop militari na sivili, tasol dispela blokada i kisim samting bilong samting long kodifikasi bilong internaasional lai bilong samting bilong samting bilong ol dispela tu sikis na santti sikis as bilong kantri bilong pasin.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
Tok Pisin: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, em ol i bin painim em long Blue Ash, Ohio, long wanpela komuniti we i stap kain olsem 15-pela 'mile' long hap not bilong Cincinnati na em i slip long graun arere long rot na em i werim wanpela 'T-shirt' na pens, na em i luk olsem em i kisim planti marasin na tingting bilong em i no klia.
English: The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free.
Tok Pisin: Ol D-Day 'landings' na ol narapela pait i bin mekim hap not bilong France i kamap fri, tasol hap saut i no bin kamap fri yet.
English: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'filter' em strong bilong wanwan i narakain, na yu mas tingting, bihaim yu mas tingting long baim wara long wanplela botol long wanpela gutpela kampani.
English: Before an organization can be innovative, leadership must create a culture of innovation as well as shared knowledge and organizational learning.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long wanpela oganaisesen i ken i gat ol nupela na narapela kain we bilong mekim samting, ol lida i mas kamapim wanpela kalsa bilong kamapim ol nupela na narapela kain samting na tu, i mas i gat pasin bilong serim save na lainim samting wantaim.
English: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.
Tok Pisin: Ol laspela risalt bilong ileksen bilong presiden na palimen bilong Nambia soim olsem presiden, Hifikepunye Pohamba, em ol i makim em wantaim bikpela namba tru long kamap presiden gen.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long dispela, tupela 'specie' bilong pis i pinis olgeta, na tupela narapela em klostu i laik pinis olgeta, wanpela bilong ol em i 'humpback chub'.
English: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela tritmen we i yusim ol 'antibody', nem bilong em ZMapp, i bin soim olsem em i ken oraitim sik, tasol bihain long ol stadi i kamap, ol i painimaut olsem em i no inap long banisim ol manmeri long i dai long rot we ol i bin tingim long en.
English: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).
Tok Pisin: Dispela progrem i stat long 8:30 p.m. long lokel taim (15.00 UTC).
English: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
Tok Pisin: "Mipela bai wok hat strong long daunim namba bilong 'carbon dioxide' we i save kamap long wanpela 'unit' bilong GDP long wanpela bikpela mak long yia 2020 long mak we em i bin i stap long en long yia 2005," Hu i tok.
English: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'outbreak' i mekim na gavman bilong India i mekim ol dispela samting kain olsem salim ol lain bilong holimpasim pik i go long ol eria we planti pik i sik na i stap, na givim tausen moskito keten (curtain) na spreyim (spray) ol 'pesticide'.

English: During the 1920s, the prevailing attitudes of most citizens and nations was that of pacifism and isolation.
Tok Pisin:'}]

predictions:
Long 1920, olgeta samting bilong kisim wari i stap long ol santing bilong kisim wari bilong pepa bilong olgeta santing bilong kisim wari bilong narapela nesin i stap long olgeta santing bilong kisim wari bilong olgeta santing bilong kisim wari bilong narapela nesin.

(During the 1920s, the prevailing attitudes of most citizens and nations was that of pacifism and isolation.)

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The top of the tower was special sanctuary for the god.
Tok Pisin: Antap long dispela taua em sampela spesol ples bilong dispela god i stap.
English: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta maus bilong hul bilong ston, we ol i kolim "The Seven Sisters", sais bilong namel bilong ol em ol i gat 100 i go long 250 mita (328 i go long 820 'feet') o moa.
English: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta fotinpela skul long Hawaii we i stap long nambis o i stap klostu long nambis i bin pas long Trinde, maski ol i bin rausim dispela tok lukaut.
English: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools.
Tok Pisin: Ol manmeri i bin save long ol bikpela kemikel elemen (chemical element) kain olsem gol, silva, na kopa (copper) long bipo taim, bikos ol i bin painim ol insait long envairomen long 'native form' na em i isi long painim ol wantaim ol tul (tool) bilong bipo.
English: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
Tok Pisin: Tasol, dispela i no save kam long liklik prais: planti taim, yu ken baim prais we i go antap foapela taim moa long prais bilong ekonomi klas long kisim bisnis klas tiket, na yu bai baim prais we i go antap 11-pela taim moa long kisim tiket bilong namba wan klas.

English: After seeing the horrors and atrocities of war during World War I, nations desired to avoid such a situation again in the future.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol kantri i lukim pinis ol pen na hevi na kranki pasin bilong woa we i kamap insait long World War I, ol kantri i laik long abrusim dispela kain samting long kamap gen long bihaintaim.
predictions: Olgeta naras long kisim wok bilong war long War War I, naras long sikispela kros bilong war, ol i kisim wanpela samting bilong no kisim wok bilong war olsem dispela samting bilong futur.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.
Tok Pisin: Dispela pasin em planti lain i save mekim, tasol em i kamapim 'wear' long plang wil bilong ol 'wagon'.
English: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.
Tok Pisin: I no gat planti lain i sindaun long Greenland. Long ol tumbuna stori bilong ol Norway, ol i tok olsem Erik the Red em ol i bin rausim em long Iceland bikos em i bin kilim wanpela man, na taim em i travel i go long wes, em i painim Greenland na em i givim dispela nem long en.
English: No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack.
Tok Pisin: Maski ol i luk olsem ol i stap isi, ol 'bison', 'elk', 'moose', bea, na klostu olgeta bikpela animal i ken pait.
English: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
Tok Pisin: Maski i no gat birua bilong tsunami i stap, ol lain i wok long pret na i stat long lusim ol bisnis na haus bilong ol.
English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
Tok Pisin: 'Great Pyramid' long Giza em i wanpela bilong ol 'seven wonders' we i sanap yet long tude.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: In 1884, Tesla moved to the United States of America to accept a job with the Edison Company in New York City.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Long 1884, Telsa i muv i go long United States of America long wok wantaim Edison Company long New York City.
predictions: 1884, Tesla i kam long Amerika Unait long wok wantaim kompani bilong Edison long New York City.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore.
Tok Pisin: Bikpela lain namba bilong ol divelopmen long Hong Kong Island i paspas na i stap long nambis long hap not ol graun we ol i bin kisim bek.
English: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'handicraft' em ol i kolim ol olsem ol 'antique', maski ol i no gat bikpela krismas wankain olsem ol narapela samting we fektori (factory) i mekim planti long wanpela taim.
English: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, wanpela rot we i go long olgeta hap bilong kantri em bai i westim mani bikos i gat sampela kar tasol, olsem na ol nupela rot bilong wokim kar i kamap bilong daunim prais bilong kar.
English: Segregation and recombination shuffle variation back and forth between the two pools with each generation.
Tok Pisin: 'Segregation' na 'recombination' i save mekim dispela 'variation' i go i kam namel long tupela 'pool' insait long wanwan 'generation'.
English: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
Tok Pisin: Long 1976, em i givim edvais long Carter long 'foreign policy', na bihain em i kisim ples bilong Henry Kissinger na wok olsem National Security Advisor (NSA) long yia 1977 i go long 1981.

predictions: Em i kam insait long US wantaim 4 sen long naming, wan buk bilong pepa bilong poeim, na wan leter bilong rekomendesion long Thomas Edison bilong Charles Batchelor (em i managing bilong em bilong wok bilong em bipo).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Everything in the Universe is made of matter. All matter is made of tiny particles called atoms.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta samting insait long Universe em ol i kamap long 'matter'. Olgeta 'matter' i gat ol liklik samting insait long ol we ol i kolim 'atom'.
English: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
Tok Pisin: Dr. Ehud Ur, em i wanpela profesa bilong marasin long Dalhousie University long Halifax, long Nova Scotia na em i siaman sains na klinik seksen bilong Canadian Diabetes Association i givim tok lukaut olsem dispela risets i nupela yet.
English: Angel (2006), explains the Continuum approach as a method being used to help organizations reach a higher level of performance.
Tok Pisin: Angel (2006), i tok klia long Continuum approach olsem wanpela metod (method) we ol i yusim long helpim oganaisesen i kamap long mak we i antap moa long sait bilong pefomen (performance).
English: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
Tok Pisin: Ol travela we i go long kantri we i gat bikpela takis sampela taim ol i ken seivim (save) bikpela mani, ol i ken seivim long ol prodak taim olsem ol 'alcoholic beverages' na 'tobacco'.
English: Some people thought he was right but many people believed the opposite; that the Solar System moved around the Earth, including the Sun (and even the other stars).

English: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction.
Tok Pisin: Maski ol pasin bilong mekim 'pyramid-bilding' long ston em i kontinu (continue) i go inap long pinis bilong Old Kingdom, ol i no winim sais na save bilong ol lain i wokim ol 'pyramid' bilong Giza.
English: The aspect ratio of this format (dividing by twelve to obtain the simplest whole-number ratio) is therefore said to be 3:2.
Tok Pisin: 'Aspect ratio' bilong dispela fomet (format) (ol i divaidim (divide) em wantaim twelv long kisim wanpela liklik 'whole-number ratio') na ol i tok dispela 'ratio' em i 3:2.
English: He trained as an obstetrician and began to work at the Auckland's National Women's Hospital in 1959.
Tok Pisin: Em i kisim treining (training) long kamap olsem wanpela 'obstetrician' na i stat long wok long Auckland's National Women's Hospital long 1959.
English: With two years of the end of the war, the former allies were now enemies and the Cold War began.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long tupela yia long pinis bilong woa, ol lain we i bin wok wantaim i kamap olsem ol birua na Cold War i stat.
English: Virtually all computers in use today are based on the manipulation of information which is coded in the form of binary numbers.
Tok Pisin: Klostu olgeta komputa we ol i yusim long tude em ol i save senisim infomesen i stap long 'code' bilong ol 'binary number'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Tasol, bikos pasin bilong salim toktok i go i kam i save kisim taim, ol stail bilong wes bai stap bihain long 25 i go long 30-pela yia.
predictions: Tupela, tupela taim long samting ol i no kisim stret long kaikai yet, kisim stail long staes i kisim pasim long 25 tupela tupela wari wantaim 30 tupela wari.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
Tok Pisin: I gat planti manmeri i stap laip yet husat i bin stap long dispela taim, na planti lain moa husat i gat ol lain we ol laikim i bin dai o ol i bin wok go na dai long hap, ol Jew na ol lain i no Jew wantaim.
English: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
Tok Pisin: Tasol Prime Minister John Howard i bin tok olsem dispela pasim em i wanpela rot tasol bilong banisim ol bilding na masin bilong dispela haus sik bai gavman bilong Tasmania i no ken mekim level bilong haus sik i go daun, olsem na em i givim dispela narapela AUD$45 milien.
English: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'search' long Internet long 'Hostile environment course' bai inap long givim adres bilong wanpela lokel kampani.
English: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
Tok Pisin: Finland em i wanpela gutpela kantri bilong raun long bot. Dispela "'Ples bilong tausen raunwara'" i gat planti tausen ailen insait long ol raunwara na long ol solwara.
English: All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta sitisen (citizen) bilong Vatican City em ol i Roman Catholic.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: taim i go long pinis bilong ol Middle Ages 'western' Europe i stat long kamapim ol stail bilong ol yet. Wanpela bilong ol bikpela divelopmen we i kamap long dispela taim bikos long ol 'crusades' em ol manmeri i stat long yusim ol baten long pasim ol klos.
predictions: long hap bilong Mistis Aij long wanpela samting bilong taim, wanpela bilong dispela bigpela kisim i stap long westerm Europa i kamap long wanem samting bilong olgeta. Ol i begunim bekim klos bilong ol long help bilong boton bilong kisim samting bilong ol i stap long kruseid.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda.
Tok Pisin: Goma em i wanpela siti we ol turis i save laik i go long en insait long Democratic Republic of Congo long hap ist klostu long kantri Rwanda.
English: Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
Tok Pisin: Long 1966 Sundarban em i bin stap olsem ples bilong ol animal, na ol i estimetim olsem i gat 400 Royal Bengal taiga na kain olsem 30,000 'spotted deer' long dispela eria.
English: Mutation adds new genetic variation, and selection removes it from the pool of expressed variation.
Tok Pisin: 'Mutation' i save mekim nupela 'genetic variation' i kamap, na 'selection' i save rausim em long 'pool' bilong 'expressed variation'.
English: Many common formats (APS family of formats, for example) are equal to or closely approximate this aspect ratio.
Tok Pisin: Planti ol fomet (format) we ol lain i save yusim (eksampel, APS famili bilong ol fomet) em i wankain o klostu wankain olsem dispela 'aspect ratio'.
English: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
Tok Pisin: 'Backpacking by ski': Dispela ektiviti em ol i save kolim tu olsem 'backcountry ski', 'ski touring' o 'ski hiking'.

English: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: 'Subistence agriculture' em i agrikalsa (agriculture) we ol lain i mekim long kamapim kaikai long mak bilong famili bilong ol.
predictions: Subsistence agriculture em i wok bilong kisim kain kain kaukau, kakaruk, kaukau, kumu na kain tumbuna samting bilong kisim kaikai gen, wantaim samting bilong no kisim samting bilong bikpela samting bilong bikpela mani. Em i save wokim gen gen gen bilong kisim kaikai gen bilong yet long kisim kaikai bilong mipla yet na mipla yet.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
Tok Pisin: Sampela bilong ol 'cruise' i save tok olsem ol i karim ol lain i go long Berlin, Germany insait long ol 'brochure' bilong ol. Olsem yu ken lukim long mep (map) i stap antap Berlin i no stap klostu long solwara na wanpela visit long siti em i no stap insait long prais bilong 'cruise'.
English: At the other end of the spectrum, one morphs into an unrecognizable individual that feels he or she must change everything the team has been doing and make it their own.
Tok Pisin: Long narapela sait, wanpela meneja i senis i go na kamap olsem wanpela man o meri we ol lain i bo save long em na em i pilim olsem em i mas senisim olgeta samting we tim i wok long mekim na mekim olgeta samting long strong bilong ol yet.
English: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta maus bilong hul bilong ston, we ol i kolim "The Seven Sisters", sais bilong namel bilong ol em ol i gat 100 i go long 250 mita (328 i go long 820 'feet') o moa.
English: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006.
Tok Pisin: 'National football' bilong Italy, wantaim 'national football' tim bilong Germany em tupela namba tu tim we i gutpela tru insait long olgeta hap bilong graun na ol i bin sempion bilong FIFA World Cup long 2006.
English: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'controller' i luk olsem wanpela 'remote controller' bilong televisen, dispela 'controller' i yusim tupela 'sensors' we i stap klostu long teleiven bilong dispela 'user' long mekim 'trangulate' long 'three dimensional space'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: 'Subsistence agriculture' em i wanpela sistem we i no yusim planti samting, i no yusim marasin, i yusim sit we ol i kisim long kaikai we i gro long dispela rijen na ol i bungim dispela ol pasin wantaim pasin bilong mekim 'crop rotation' o ol narapela isipela teknik (technique) bilong mekim kaikai i kamap planti.
predictions: Subsistence agriculture em siyem simple, often organic, sistem we i save kaikai samting bilong graun bilong olgeta hap bilong kantri, using planting samting bilong graun we i save long ples bilong olgeta hap bilong kantri, long samting bilong rotesen long graun o other simple ting bilong maximize kaikai.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Olsem na, pensil (pencil) em i bin wanpela gutpela pren bilong planti manmeri taim em i bin kamap.

Tok Pisin: Ol meri em ol i kam long wanpela famili, kain olsem wanpela bikpela famili bilong ol sista na ol pikinini meri bilong ol.

Tok Pisin: Ol foapela meri bilong ski insait long 'women's sitting group' i no pinisim ol ran bilong ol, na 45 bilong ol 117 lain i ski long Giant Slalom i no kisim wanpela 'rank' insait long dispela resis.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity.
Tok Pisin: Long mekim 'traffic flow' i kamap gutpela moa, ol rilesensip i mas kamap namel long tripela bikpela samting: (1) 'flow', (2) 'density', and (3) 'velocity'.
English: Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).
Tok Pisin: Yu mas strong na tok nogat long ol man, no ken pret long sanap strong na toktok (pasin em i pasin bilong dispela ples, em i no orait long ol i mekim olsem!).
English: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol ofisa i sekim nem na ples bilong dispela vota (voter) pinis, dispela vota bai putim dispela envelop (envelope) i go insait long 'ballot box' na putim siknesa bilong em long list bilong ol lain i kam na makim kendidet bilong ol.
English: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path.
Tok Pisin: Maus bilong em i gat moa long 70-pela tit we i sap olsem resa, wantaim wanpela narapela lain tit we i stap long ruf bilong maus. Dispela em i min olsem wanem samting em i bungim bai i no inap long ranawe.
English: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela husat bai draiv long ples we i stap antap moa o antap long ol maunten i mas tingim olsem i ken i gat sno (snow), ais, o tempritsa (temperature) we i kol nogut tru.

predictions: Subkultur i kisim tasol samting bilong ol manmeri i laik olsem, em i kisim no gut long stendat bilong sosait, na kisim gut wanpela samting bilong bungim olgeta samting bilong ol long olgeta.

English: The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.
Tok Pisin: Bikpela Amazon River em i 6,387 km (3,980 miles). Em i save kolektim ol wara i kam long planti tausen liklik wara.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

English: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
Tok Pisin: Ol i bin tok olsem ol bai i katim em i go daun long Tunde, tasol wanpela imejensi kot 'ruling' i seivim dispela diwai.
English: It has been known for a long time that different types of brain damage, traumas, lesions, and tumours affect behaviour and cause changes in some mental functions.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save long longpela taim pinis olsem ol kainkain bagarap i kamap long brein (brain), ol 'trauma', ol 'lesion', na ol 'tumour' i ken mekim pasin i senis na kamapim senis long tingting.
English: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol planti 'fruit pastry', na i gat ol epol we ol i wokim 'pastry' long en i save stap long olgeta taim bilong yia, na ol 'cherry pastry' na 'plum pastry' em ol i save mekim long taim bilong sama (summer).
English: At the same time, the German navy, using mainly U-boats, was trying to stop this traffic.
Tok Pisin: Long wankain taim, 'navy' bilong Germany, i yusim ol U-boat, na i wok long traim long stopim dispela long kamap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong yusim vidio rekoding i mekim na ol saveman i painimaut long ol impoten samting long sait bilong mining bilong 'micro-expression', ol muvmen bilong pes we i save kamap insait long sampela 'millisecond'.

Tok Pisin: Tripela moa bom i pairap klostu long ol bilding bilong gavman insait long tupela aua.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.

Sampela 'feral' pikinini em sampela lain (planti taim em i papamam bilong ol yet) i save mekim ol i stap long haus tasol; long sampela taim ol papamama i no bisi long dispela pikinini bikos em i gat samting i rong long het bilong em o long bodi bilong em.
