Manmeri (usually ol papa bilong ol) i save kisim ol long wanpela haus sik (usually ol papa bilong ol) na long kaen kaen kaikai bilong ol; long kaen kes bilong dispela samting ol i kisim long pikinini bilong ol i save kisim long kaikai bilong ol i save kisim long ol lain bilong sampela pikinini i gat sevis bilong intellect o kisim samting bilong kisim samting bilong krope bilong ol i save kisim gut olsem ol i no gat gutpela samting bilong kisim long ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, bihain long Revolution ol wok i op long olgeta man long larim ol man i gat driman na i save wok hat long mekim ol gutpela wok we ol i laik long mekim.
English: The aspect ratio of this format (dividing by twelve to obtain the simplest whole-number ratio) is therefore said to be 3:2.
Tok Pisin: 'Aspect ratio' bilong dispela fomet (format) (ol i divaidim (divide) em wantaim twelv long kisim wanpela liklik 'whole-number ratio') na ol i tok dispela 'ratio' em i 3:2.
English: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
Tok Pisin: Ol woklain i mas kisim tok orait long ol lain i antap long ol bipo long ol i mekim wanpela disisen, na ol i mas harim tok stia bilong ol lain we ol i wok aninit long en na ol i no ken askim kwesten.
English: Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years.
Tok Pisin: Nau sains (science) i soim olsem dispela traipela 'carbon economy' em i rausim 'biosphere' long wanpela 'stable state' we i bin sapotim ol manmeri long tupela milien yia i go pinis.
English: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
Tok Pisin: Stesin bilong dispela websait kolim dispela 'show' olsem "wanpela redio drama we i bihainim ol stail bilong bipo tasol i gat nupela na narapela kain kleva (clever) stail long em!"
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Feral children may have experienced severe child abuse or trauma before being abandoned or running away.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol 'feral' pikinini em ol sampela bikpela bagarap o 'trauma' i bin kamap long ol bipo long ol i ranawe o papamama i no bisi long ol.
predictions: Feral pikinini i kisim save long sik long rot bilong pikinini o kros bilong pikinini tasol yet i kisim kisim long ston i go bekim o i kisim kisim long kros bilong pikinini.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Japans holds nearly 7,000 islands (the biggest being Honshu), making Japan the 7th largest island in the world!
Tok Pisin: Japan i gat 7,000 ailan (bikpela ailan tru em i Honshu), na dispela i mekim Japan i kamalpl olsem namba 7 bikpela ailan insait long olgeta hap bilong graun.
English: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
Tok Pisin: Em i no samting bilong sem long en: em i no narakain long ol narapela samting ol manmeri i save pret long em na ol narapela samting ol planti manmeri i save les long en.
English: Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife.
Tok Pisin: Madagascar em i wanpela bikpela tru, na em i kain olsem wanpela kontinen (continent) bilong em, taim yumi lukluk long sait bilong 'wildlife'.
English: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
Tok Pisin: Dispela laspela geim (game) bilong 'series' bai kamap long Ellis Park long Johannesburg long wik i kam, taim ol Sprinboks i pilai agensim ol Australia.
English: It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i namba faiv CEP bilong Martelly insait long foapela yia.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol narapela 'feral' pikinini em ol lain i tok olsem ol animal long bus i lukautim ol; sampela em ol lain i tok olsem ol i stap ol yet long bus.
predictions: Ol narapela i save tingting long ol i save kamap long rot bilong animel, na ol narapela i save stap long waild bilong ol yet long wanpela samting.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife.
Tok Pisin: 'Nature-based tourism' em i save pulim ol manmeri we i intres long lukim ol eria bilong 'nature' na amamas long lukim ol ples, wantaim ol plent (plent) na animal bilong dispela eria.
English: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign.
Tok Pisin: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard i tok olsem long taim bilong kempen (campaign) long 2010 ileksen bilong gavman em i bilip olsem Australia i mas kamap olsem wanpela 'republic' taim Queen Elizabeth II i pinis long bosim kantri bilong ol.
English: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river.
Tok Pisin: Amazon River em i namba tu longpela wara na namba wan bikpela wara long Earth. Em i karim wara we mak bilong em i 8-pela taim moa long namba tu bikpela wara.
English: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
Tok Pisin: USA Gymnastics i sapotim leta bilong United States Olympic Commitee na em i save olsem dispela em i wanpela bikpela samting tru long Olymlpic famili long kamapim wanpela seif envairomen bilong olgeta 'athletes'.
English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
Tok Pisin: Yu kem mekim ol mak bilong yu yet wantaim pensil, tasol tingim ol 'bowing marks' we ol i printim pinis em i gat as na ol i stap, olsem na yu mas rispektim ol.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Taim ol animal i lukautim ol dispela pikinini, ol dispela 'feral' pikinini save soim ol pasin (we ol inap long mek) we i wankain olsem pasin bilong dispela animal we i lukautim ol, kain olsem pret o i no save wanem samting bilong mekim taim em i stap wantaim ol narapela manmeri.
predictions: Tok Pisin: Manmeri bilong wanpela 'feral child' we i save kisim up bringim long non-human animals, em i save shownim bekim (long wanpela limita bilong bodi) almos tasol samting bilong animals bilong kisim kaen, olsem em i save kisim bikpela kros bilong ol human.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris.
Tok Pisin: United States Strategic Command bilong U.S Department of Defense ofis i wok long painim na makim ol hap hap pat we i stap yet.
English: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
Tok Pisin: Finland em i wanpela gutpela kantri bilong raun long bot. Dispela "'Ples bilong tausen raunwara'" i gat planti tausen ailen insait long ol raunwara na long ol solwara.
English: "This is not going to be goodbye. This is the closing of one chapter and the opening of a new one."
Tok Pisin: "Dispela em i no gutbai. Dispela em i taim bilong pasim wanpela sapta na opim nupela sapta."
English: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
Tok Pisin: Ol i stap kol moa long ol ples we i raunim ol long san na long nait ol i hot moa long ol ples we i raunim ol.
English: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
Tok Pisin: Danius i tok, "Nau yet, mipela i no wok long mekim wanpela samting. Mi bin ring na salim ol i-meil long man i save wok wantaim em na mi bin kisim ol gutpela bekim na dispela em i inap."
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Maski, 'project based learning' i mekim pasin bilong lainim samting i kamap isi moa na i kirapim intres (interest), 'scaffolding' em i mekim moa samting.
predictions: While project based learning i mas makim samting laik learing i go simplespela na interes, scaffolding i go bek long wanpela step bilong samting nabaut.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
Tok Pisin: Ol dispela graun i save kamapim ol 'sandbars' na ol nambis, we i save stap olsem ol ples bilong ol kainkain animal bilong bus.
English: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts".
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken mekim em i kama bun na liklik nogut tru na stikim (stick) em i go long ol narapela metel (metal). Sampela taim ol i ken mekim em i kama bun nogut tru na yusim em long bilasim ol piksa we ol peintim (paint) long han na insait long buk we ol i kolim "illuminated manuscripts".
English: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.
Tok Pisin: Taim yumi skelim olgeta samting, yumi mas no ken kirap nogut sapos ol tumbuna bilong ol i stretim ol "problem bilong 'protein'" bilong ol long wankain we olsem ol 'chimps' long 'savanna' i save mekim long tude.
English: The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa.
Tok Pisin: Dispela siti em i ples bilong i stap long en na klaimim Nyiragongo volkeno wantaim ol lain bilong painim Moutain Gorilla. Prais bilong ol dispela lain bilong painim gorila i orait moa long ol narapela insait long Africa.
English: As a result, the process of an organization working together to overcome an obstacle can lead to a new innovative process to serve the customer's need.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long dispela, proses (process) bilong wanpela oganaisesen long wok wantaim na daunim wanpela hatpela samting i ken kamap ol nupela narapela kain proses bilong inapim nid bilong kastoma.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: 'Scaffolding' em i no wanpela metod (method) bilong lainim samting tasol em i wanpela helpim we i save givim sapot long ol wanwan sumatin husat i wok long lainim wanpela nupela samting kain olsem yusim wanpela nupela komputa o statim wanpela nupela projek (project).
predictions: Scaffolding i no wanpela metod bilong lernim, tasol em i wanpela hap bilong helpim olgeta manmeri i kisim no gut wokim samting nius long olgeta samting bilong lern long nius samting tasol, olsem samting bilong painim wanpela nius samting bilong kisim no gut long kaunsol long kompiuta bilong yu o stap bek long wanpela nius samting bilong wok.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.
Tok Pisin: I gat 17,000 ailan long makim wanpela long en, kaikai bilong Indonesia em i wanpela bikpela nem we i karampaim ol kainkain kaikai we yu ken painim long olgeta hap bilong Indonesia.
English: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
Tok Pisin: Laspela nius bilong dispela i mekim ripot olsem, level bilong ol 'sea readings' i soim olsem wanpela tsunami i bin kamap. Tru tru i bin i gat sampela ektiviti bilong tsunami we ol i bin rekodim klostu long Pago Pago na Niue.
English: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
Tok Pisin: Long Japan, empera (emperor) i save holim ol pati bilong ol namba wan 'cherry blossom' pati bilong em yet na ol memba bilong 'aristocracy' long Imperial Court.
English: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
Tok Pisin: Insait long 1960, Brezezinski i wok olsem wanpela edvaisa bilong John F. Kennedy na bihain em i wok long Lyndon B. Johnson edministresen.
English: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
Tok Pisin: Dispela Report i stat wantaim wanpela askim long i mas i gat 'open debate' na wanbel long wanpela tingting i kamap long polisi bilong United States i go long Middle East.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol 'scaffold' em ol i ken kamap long komputa o em i ken tru insait long klasrum, narapela we bilong tok em i olsem, wanpela tisa em wanpela 'scaffold', tasol wanpela 'paperclip man' insait long Microsoft Office em tu i wanpela 'scaffold'.
predictions: Skets long kalibala ken bai i stap bilong wanpela samting kalabus na wanpela samting real, em i save mean olsem, wanpela tisa bilong skul em i wanpela samting bilong skets tasol, long wanpela samting, wanpela liklik man bilong papklip long Microsoft Office em i wanpela samting bilong skets tasol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River.
Tok Pisin: Kruger National Park (KNP) i stap long hap 'north-east' bilong South Africa na i ran arere long bod bilong Mozambique long is, Zimbabwe long not, na boda long hap saut em Crocodile River.
English: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain i save stadi long 'nature' na ol 'philosophy' i save lukluk long ol 'classical texts', kain olsem, Bible long tok ples Latin.
English: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
Tok Pisin: Ol gem i stat long 10:00am wantaim gutpela weda na maski i bin i gat liklik ren long moning, em i pinis hariap, dispela de em i gutpela tru long pilai ragbi 7's.
English: While he was working at the hospital Liggins began to investigate premature labor during his spare time.
Tok Pisin: Taim em i wok long haus sik Liggins i stat long mekim investigesen (investigation) long 'premature labour' long taim bilong em yet.
English: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong wanwan gavman long givim ol paspot (passport) we ol i no makim (X) long man o meri o givim ol dokumen long soim senis long nem na man i go long meri o meri i go long man em i narakain narakain long wanwan gavman.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol 'scaffold' long komputa em ol i stap insait long ol 'software' na wok bilong ol em long askim kwesten, tok save long wanem samting bilong mekim, na tok klia long ol rot bilong mekim samting we i hat long ol sumatin long mekim long save bilong ol yet.
predictions: Virtual Scaffolds i save stap long insait long samting bilong samting bilong software na i mas i gat samting bilong kisim kisim kwesten, kisim kisim, na kisim kisim samting bilong proseda long wanem em i no gutpela long samting bilong stident long han bilong em yet.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
Tok Pisin: Taim Federal Government i kam na i kisim ol mani bilong Mersey haus sik long Devonport, long Tasmania, gavman bilong dispela 'state' na ol sampela MP bilong gavman i tok strong olsem dispela pasim em i trik bilong redi long ileksen we bai kamap long Novemba.
English: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'coalition' na soldia bilong Afghanistan i muv i go long dispela eria long kisim dispela hap na ol i salim ol narapela balus bilong ol 'coalition' long helpim ol long mekim dispela.
English: It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
Tok Pisin: Em i gutpela long wanpela long baim wanpela Wild Card, we i save givim tok orait long i go insait long ol park insait long South Africa o olgeta South African National Parks.
English: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, dispela leta i tok olsem Turkey bai i mekim wok bilong was long ol soldia bilong ISIS we ol kantri bilong Europe i no laik long salim i go bek long kantri bilong ol.
English: The amount of inner peace a person possesses correlates oppositely to the amount of tension in one’s body and spirit.
Tok Pisin: Mak bilong bel isi i stap insait long wanpela man i gat koneksen (connection) tasol em i oposit (opposite) long mak bilong hevi we i stap insait long bodi na spirit bilong wanpela man.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Children are placed in Foster Care for a wide variety of reasons that range from neglect, to abuse, and even to extortion.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol i save putim ol pikinini long Foster Care bikos long kainkain samting na em i ken 'neglect', i go long 'abuse', na pasin bilong fosim pikinini long mekim samting bilong kisim mani.
predictions: Pikinini i kisim pleis long Foster Kare bilong wanpela samting bilong samting we i save kamap long wanpela samting bilong kisim samting we i save go long no kisim samting bilong ol, kisim samting bilong ol, na kisim samting bilong ol long krosim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i save wok stap olsem man o meri we i save bungim ol grup we i wok wantaim long ofis.
English: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30.
Tok Pisin: Ol bas (bus) i save lusim 'inter-district bus station' (we i stap long narapela sait bilong wara) long de taim, maski planti, bilong ol we i go long is na Jakar/Bumthang i save lusim stesin long namel long 06:30 na 07:30.
English: The lower the tension, the more positive the life force present. Every person has the potential to find absolute peace and contentment.
Tok Pisin: Taim hevi em i liklik, bai i gat moa positif fos bilong laip i stap. Olgeta man i gat strong long painim bel isi tru na amamas.
English: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken lukim ol 'pyramid' long tudak na yu ken lukim ol tu bipo long 'show' i stat.
English: For example, the most common still image photography format in the world is 35mm, which was the dominant film size at the close of the analog film era.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel, 'still image photography' fomet (format) we planti lain i save long en em i 35mm, we i nambawan sais bilong 'film' bihain long taim bilong 'analog film'.

English: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do.

predictions: No child i stap long eniwantok we no i save nurturing, karing, na helpim samting, tasol ol i stap long enim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'content theories' i save lukluk long painimaut wanem ol samting i save kirapim bel bilong ol manmeri o i tasim bel na tingting bilong ol.
English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'alloy'em ol samting we i gat tupela o moa metel (metal) insait long en. No ken lus tingting olsem i gat planti elemen (element) insait long 'periodic table'.
English: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri em ol i kam long wanpela famili, kain olsem wanpela bikpela famili bilong ol sista na ol pikinini meri bilong ol.
English: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
Tok Pisin: Long ol liklik ailan na ol raunwara, yu bai no inap nidim wanpela 'yatch'.
English: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
Tok Pisin: 'Skiing' em i wanpela ektiviti bilong raun we ol lain i save laik long mekim, ol i kolim "'ski bums'," ol i save plenim holide bilong ol long mekim 'skiing' long wanpela lokesen.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program.
Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela wok patnasip (partnership) bilong NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, ol volentia we i kwalifai (qualify) em ol i rikrutim (recruit) ol aninit long 'hunting progrem' bilong Sporting Shooters Association.
English: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong flai long balus em i ken wanpela ekspiriens wei mekim ol manmeri i gat kainkain krismas na i kam long kainkain ples i pret, bikpela moa em sapos ol i no bin flai bipo o i bin stap insait long wanpela samting nogut we i kamap long balus bipo.
English: Feral children may have experienced severe child abuse or trauma before being abandoned or running away.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'feral' pikinini em ol sampela bikpela bagarap o 'trauma' i bin kamap long ol bipo long ol i ranawe o papamama i no bisi long ol.
English: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.
Tok Pisin: Ol i karim dispela man biling kisim foto i go long Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, we em i stap i go na em i dai.
English: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
Tok Pisin: 'Duty free shopping' em i sans long baim ol samting we yu no inap long baim takis na 'excises' long sampela lokesen.

predictions: System bilong kisim pikinini bilong kisim kaikai i mas bekim samting wei i save, kaikai i mas kamap long olgeta taim, stedim olgeta klas long skul, na helt bilong gut i stap raun.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'peacekeepers' bilong UN, husat i bin kam long Haiti bihain long bikpela guria bilong yia 2010, em ol lain i sutim tok long ol olsem ol i mekim dispela sik i go long ol manmeri na dispela sik i stat klostu long kem bilong ol.
English: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.

English: The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte.

Tok Pisin: Long 1956 Slania i muv i go long Sweden, tripela yia bihain em i stat wok long Swedish Post Office na kamap olsem 'chief engraver' bilong ol.

Tok Pisin: Bikos ol 'inter-district' bas (bus) i save pulap, em i gutpela long baim wanpela tiket sampela de bipo long taim bilong kalap long bas.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.

English: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.

English: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.

English: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations.

English: The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'hotpela chocolate' em i stap long stendet bilong ol Belgium. Em i bikpela man i long ol frut jus, tasol ol i nambawan.

Tok Pisin: Dispela em i luk olsem i stret, bikos yumi no save pilim olsem Earth i muv, a?
English: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.

English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
Tok Pisin: Yu kem mekim ol mak bilong yu yet wantaim pensil, tasol tingim ol 'bowing marks' we ol i printim pinis em i gat as na ol i stap, olsem na yu mas rispektim ol.
English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'alloy'em ol samting we i gat tupela o moa metel (metal) insait long en. No ken lus tingting olsem i gat planti elemen (element) insait long 'periodic table'.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol 'monastery' i save givim ol laplap long ol meri we i no redi na i kam, tasol sapos yu bringim laplap bilong yu, gutpela moa long bringim wanpela we i gat ol brait (bright) kala, yu bai kisim wanpela smail long wanpela 'monk' o wanpela 'nun' long dua bilong go insait.
English: The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'hotpela chocolate' em i stap long stendet bilong ol Belgium. Em i bikpela man i long ol frut jus, tasol ol i nambawan.
English: The term bug is used by entomologists in a formal sense for this group of insects.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'bug' em ol entomolojist (entomologist) i save yusim long toktok long dispela grup bilong ol binatang.
English: Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists.
Tok Pisin: Rolando Mendoza i sut long M16 gan bilong em long ol turis.
English: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong ainim (iron) ol wet klos i ken helpim ol long drai. Planti ol hotel i gat ain na bod bilong ain i stap bilong yusim, maski sapos wanpela ain i no i stap ples klia insait long rum.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol 'mutation' we i kamap insait long ol 'germ-line cell' tasol em ol i ken i go long ol pikinini, tasol ol 'mutation' we i kamap long narapela hap i ken kamapim 'cell-death' o kensa.
predictions: Tok Pisin: Ol samting we i save kamap long sait long ol samting bilong samting bilong graim-laen (germ-line) samting i save go long pikinini, tasol samting bilong samting i stap long wanpela narapela hap i save kamap long sik long ol samting bilong sait o samting bilong kenser.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
Tok Pisin: Bipo em i bin wanpela siti ol i kolim Smyrna, nau em i kamap olsem siti bilong tude, em i divelop pinis, na planti wok bisnis i save kamap long en, em i stap raunim wanpela basis na ol maunten i raunim em.
English: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'show' em pastaim em ol 'voice actor' we i no gat planti save na ekspiriens (experience) i ektim, na ol i bilong East Texas.
English: Tommy Dreamer said "Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."
Tok Pisin: Tommy Dreamer i tok "Luna em i namba wan Queen of Extreme. Em i namba wan meneja bilong mi. Luna i lusim mipela long nait bilong tupela mun. Dispela em i narakain samting na i wankain olsem pasin bilong em. Strongpela meri."
English: The presence of a true “invisible team” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) is also a unique component of a virtual team.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela trupela “'invisible team'” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) em i wanpela narakain samting i stap insait long ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa.
English: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
Tok Pisin: South Africa i bin winim All Blacks (New Zealand) long 'rugby union' long Tri Nations geim (game) long Royal Bafokeng Stadium long Rustenburg, South Africa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: 'Nature-based tourism' em i save pulim ol manmeri we i intres long lukim ol eria bilong 'nature' na amamas long lukim ol ples, wantaim ol plent (plent) na animal bilong dispela eria.
predictions: Tok Pisin: Turisim bilong narapela pasin (nature-based tourism) i kisim samting bilong ol manmeri i wanbel long wokabaut long ol area bilong nakarik (natural areas) long sampela pasin bilong enjoi long skenari (scenery), em i including planti wanpela bilong ol samting bilong nakarik (including plant and animal wildlife).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign.
Tok Pisin: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard i tok olsem long taim bilong kempen (campaign) long 2010 ileksen bilong gavman em i bilip olsem Australia i mas kamap olsem wanpela 'republic' taim Queen Elizabeth II i pinis long bosim kantri bilong ol.
English: Sharing a field trip virtually is also a great way to reflect a on a trip and share experiences with future classes.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong serim wanpela 'field trip' long komputa em i wanpela gutpela we tu long tingting lon wanpela raun na serim ol samting i bin kamap wantaim klas bilong bihaintaim.
English: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain we i dai em Nicholas Alden, 25, na Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback i bin draivim kar.
English: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
Tok Pisin: Tasol bikos em i stap long "‘high tropics’" sampela ‘degree’ not long ‘equator’ yu bai nid long stap insait long hot (olgeta taim) na strongpela san (taim san i klia, dispela i no save kamap planti taim).
English: Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented that "Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."
Tok Pisin: Dustin "Goldust" Runnels i tok olsem "Luna i save mekim ol kainkain samting olsem mi…ating em i winim mi…laikim em na misim (miss) em…mi bilip olsem em i stap long gutpela ples."
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Eksampel bilong ol 'on-site activity' em painim pis, kisim foto, lukim ol pisin, na raun long ol 'park' na stadim infomesen long 'ecosystem'.
predictions: Samting bilong graun i gat em i gumi (hunting), pes fis (fishing), fotografi, wokim samting bilong birda (bird watching), go long pakar (visiting parks) na kisim samting bilong stadi (studying information about the ecosystem).

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.

English: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
Tok Pisin: Ol i wok long traim yet long painimaut mak bilong dispela bikpela paia na em i bin kamapim wanem kain bagarap long Earth.
English: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'medical charity' Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres na the World Health Organisation i tok olsem dispela em i 'outbreak' we i stap long mak nogut tru insait long dispela kantri.
English: Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies.
Tok Pisin: Tok ples Italian em ol lain i save wok insait long steit (state) i save yusim tu long toktok long olgeta de na ol i save yusim Latin long mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) bilong lotu.
English: Thus, the pencil was a good friend to many people when it came out.
Tok Pisin: Olsem na, pensil (pencil) em i bin wanpela gutpela pren bilong planti manmeri taim em i bin kamap.

English: Today, the only insects that cannot fold back their wings are dragon flies and mayflies.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Resting on the top of one of the mountains north of Mecca, the cave is completely isolated from the rest of the world.
Tok Pisin: Em i stap antap long wanpela bilong ol maunten long hap not bilong Mecca, dispela hul bilong ston em i stap hait long olgeta hap bilong graun.
English: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save insait long Metro em ol i save mekim long tok ples Catalan tasol, tasol ol samting we ol i no plen long mekim em wanpela 'automatic' sistem i save mekim dispela tok save long ol kainkain tok ples olsem Spanish, English, French, Arabic na Japanese.
English: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do.
Tok Pisin: No gat wanpela pikinini i mas stap insait long wanpela envairomen we i no gutpela long ol, i no lukautim ol, na i givim save long ol, tasol ol i save stap insait long kain envairomen olsem.
English: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambawan tok ples bilong Barcelona em Catalan na Spanish. Klostu hap namba bilong ol lain i stap long hap i save tok ples Catalan, bikpela namba moa i save long em, na klostu olgeta lain i save long Spanish.
English: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
Tok Pisin: Mi no save sapos yu luksave long dispela o nogat, tasol planti bilong ol kago i kam long Central America i kam insait long kantri 'duty-free'.

predictions: Insait long dispela dainamik tranispot long samting, olgeta i somepela how bilong konektim na stapim long sistem bilong tras long samting bilong kars pruvit.

English: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bom i stap long kar na i pairap long bikpela ofis bilong ol polis long Gaziantep, long Turkey aste moning na i kilim tupela polis ofisa na kamapim bagarap long bodi bilong moa long twentipela narapela manmeri.
English: You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken yusim boda-boda (motobaik teksi) long raun insait long Goma. Lokel prais bilong dispela em i ~500 Congolese Francs long ron long sotpela hap.
English: Sharing a field trip virtually is also a great way to reflect a on a trip and share experiences with future classes.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong serim wanpela 'field trip' long komputa em i wanpela gutpela we tu long tingting lon wanpela raun na serim ol samting i bin kamap wantaim klas bilong bihaintaim.
English: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.
Tok Pisin: Bihain ol ripot i tok olsem dispela balus i kisim wanpela 'bomb threat' olsem na ol salim em i go bek long Afghanistan, na em i go daun long Kandahar.
English: With two years of the end of the war, the former allies were now enemies and the Cold War began.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long tupela yia long pinis bilong woa, ol lain we i bin wok wantaim i kamap olsem ol birua na Cold War i stat.

English: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.

English: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
Tok Pisin: USA Gymnastics na USOC i gat wankain as tingting — mekim geim bilong 'gymnastics', na ol narapela, i kamap seif olgeta bai ol 'athletes' i ken bihainim ol driman bilong ol long wanpela seif, positif na gutpela envairomen we i mekim ol i pilim olsem ol i inap long mekim samting.
English: In a carriage, they traveled back to Paris surrounded by a mob of people screaming and shouting threats against the King and Queen.
Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela karis, ol i ron i go bek long Paris taim ol bikpela lain manmeri i belhat na i raunim ol na i wok long singaut na mekim ol kainkain toktok bilong pretim King na Queen.
English: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
Tok Pisin: Taim ol i askim em long mekim sampela toktok, Miller i tok, "Mike i save toktok planti taim long taim bilong dispela kot...I wok long redi olsem na mi no harim wanem samting em wok long tok."
English: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
Tok Pisin: Kapitol bilong Moldova em Chişinău. Lokel tok ples bilong dispela ples em Romanian, tasol ol i save yusim Russian long planti hap.
English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
Tok Pisin: Yu kem mekim ol mak bilong yu yet wantaim pensil, tasol tingim ol 'bowing marks' we ol i printim pinis em i gat as na ol i stap, olsem na yu mas rispektim ol.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The vertical clearance under the bridge is 15 meters. Construction was completed in August 2011, it didn't open to traffic until March 2017.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Dispela 'vertical clearance' aninit long bris em i 15 mita. Konstraksen (construction) i bin pinis long Ogas 2011, em i no op long ol kar i ron i go inap long Mas 2017.
predictions: Vertikal klirans bilong samting bilong kisim wari long brij long dispela ples em 15 meter. Konstruksion i klinim pinis long Agost 2011, tasol em i no klinim yet long opem long samting bilong kisim wari tasol tasol long Mars 2017.

English: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
Tok Pisin: 'Pyramid sound and light show' em i wanpela samting we ol pikinini i save laikim na em i stap long dispela eria.
English: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
Tok Pisin: Ol buk na megasin we i toktok long pasin bilong stap long ples nating i save stap long planti hap, tasol i no gat planti pablikesen we i save toktok long ol 'war zone'.
English: He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth.
Tok Pisin: Pastaim em i bin stap long James Paget Hospital long Great Yarmouth.
English: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu no save long draiv long ol rot autsait long siti, yu mas strongim yu yet: i gat ol ples we i sut i go daun o i kam antap, i gat ol liklik rot we i no gat spes long ron, na ol sap kona.
English: The Northern Marianas emergency management office said that there were no damages reported in the nation.
Tok Pisin: Northern Marianas ofis we i save menejim imejensi i tok olsem i no gat bagarap i kamap insait long kantri.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
Tok Pisin: Ol woklain i mas kisim tok orait long ol lain i antap long ol bipo long ol i mekim wanpela disisen, na ol i mas harim tok stia bilong ol lain we ol i wok aninit long en na ol i no ken askim kwesten.
English: Curtis Cooper, a mathematician and computer science professor at the University of Central Missouri, has discovered the largest known prime number to date on January 25.
Tok Pisin: Curtis Cooper, wanpela 'mathematician' na 'computer science professor' long University of Central Missouri, i bin painimaut olsem bikpela 'prime number' tru long Jenueri 25.
English: With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations.
Tok Pisin: Wantaim Kundalini Yoga dispela Kundalini energy ('enlightenment energy') em i save kirap insait long 'yoga postures', eksesais bilong pulim win, ol 'mantra' na 'visualizations'.
English: There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol toilet bilong bipotaim tru long Egypt, Persia na China. Long hap bilong ol Rome, ol toilet em ol i stap olsem hap bilong ol pablik haus bilong waswas we ol man na meri i save bung wantaim.
English: It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i namba faiv CEP bilong Martelly insait long foapela yia.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol Gurani em ol impoten as ples manmeri we i stap nau long ples we ol i kolim Eastern Paraguay, na ol i save raun na pasinim abus na tu, ol i save planim kaikai long gaden.
predictions: Guaraní i wanpela no. wan samting bilong insait long indigenous group we i stap long hap bilong Eastern Paraguay tasol, ol i save stap olsem semi-nomadic hunter na ol i save praktisim subsistence agriculture.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
Tok Pisin: ASUS Eee PC, we ol i bin mekim presentesen bilong em i go long olgeta hap bilong graun bikos em i ken seivim man na em i ken mekim planti impoten wok, em i kamap olsem wanpela bikpela topik we ol lain i wok long toktok long em long 2007 Taipei IT Month.
English: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
Tok Pisin: Ol kendidet (candidate) i ken salim ol lain we i makim ol long go na witnesim olgeta wanwan hap bilong wok. Long avinun, ol volentia (volunteer) i save kaunim ol vot (vote) na i gat ol lain i save bihainim ol prosidia (procedure) bilong supavaisim (supervise) wok bilong ol.
English: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
Tok Pisin: Ol wara we i stap insait long ples em ol gutpela samting bilong mekim holide long en.
English: Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity.
Tok Pisin: Stat long taim ol i kamapim Asunción long 1537, Paraguay i bin larim planti bilong ol pasin na kalsa bilong ol asples grup i stap yet.
English: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
Tok Pisin: Em i gat kainkain ol plent (plant), bikos long kainkain 'microclimate' bilong en, ol kainkain graun na level bilong graun em i stap long en.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Chaco rijen i gat ol narapela grup bilong ol asples manmeri kain olsem ol Guaycurú na Payaguá, husat i save painim abus, pis na bungim ol kaikai ol i painim long bus.
predictions: Chako regio i kisim gut long ol narapela grup bilong indan kantri tasol, tasol ol i save stap long hantim, kisim gut na kisim faud long wanem. Ol i save kamap long haus long Chako regio tasol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
Tok Pisin: Dispela tok save i bin kamap bihain long Trump i toktok long telefon wantaim Presiden bilong kantri Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
English: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.
Tok Pisin: As tingting bilong sains (science) em long painimaut wanem we dispela graun i wok taim ol yusim ol 'scientific method'. Dispela metod (method) i save stiaim planti bilong ol 'scientific research'.
English: It has been known for a long time that different types of brain damage, traumas, lesions, and tumours affect behaviour and cause changes in some mental functions.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save long longpela taim pinis olsem ol kainkain bagarap i kamap long brein (brain), ol 'trauma', ol 'lesion', na ol 'tumour' i ken mekim pasin i senis na kamapim senis long tingting.
English: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
Tok Pisin: . Ol saintis i tok olsem kala bilong gras bilong dispela animas em i 'chestnut-brown' long antap wantaim wanpela 'pale' o 'carotenoid-colored' long aninit sait.
English: It can be pulled into thin wire, which can be twisted and plaited. It can be hammered or rolled into sheets.
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken pulim em na mekim em i kamap wanpela liklik bun waia, we ol i ken tanim tanim na pasim. Ol i ken paitim em long hama o rolim na kamapim ol 'sheets'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Long '16th century' Paraguay, we ol i bin kolim "The Giant Province of the Indies", i bin kamap taim ol lain Spain i kam bosim ol asples lain.
predictions: long sikis silen, Paraguay, i kisim kainkain bagarap bilong kisim samting bilong ol 'The Giant Province of the Indies', i kamap bilong ren long kisim samting bilong ol Spaniol konketa long samting bilong ol nativ indian grup.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Taim ol animal i lukautim ol dispela pikinini, ol dispela 'feral' pikinini save soim ol pasin (we ol inap long mek) we i wankain olsem pasin bilong dispela animal we i lukautim ol, kain olsem pret o i no save wanem samting bilong mekim taim em i stap wantaim ol narapela manmeri.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
Tok Pisin: Maski, 'project based learning' i mekim pasin bilong lainim samting i kamap isi moa na i kirapim intres (interest), 'scaffolding' em i mekim moa samting.
English: Tommy Dreamer said "Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."
Tok Pisin: Tommy Dreamer i tok "Luna em i namba wan Queen of Extreme. Em i namba wan meneja bilong mi. Luna i lusim mipela long nait bilong tupela mun. Dispela em i narakain samting na i wankain olsem pasin bilong em. Strongpela meri."
English: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.
Tok Pisin: Dispela pasin em planti lain i save mekim, tasol em i kamapim 'wear' long plang wil bilong ol 'wagon'.
English: The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side.
Tok Pisin: 'Crust' bilong em i kain olsem 70 km 'thick' long sait i stap klostu na 100 km 'thick' long sait i stap longwe.
English: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
Tok Pisin: Sapos wanpela 'rider' i pundaun long wanpela hos, tasol lek bilong em i pas long 'stirrup', hos i ken pulim ol taim em i ranawe. Long daunim mak bilong dispela hevi long kamap, ol 'rider' i mas mekim samting long abrusim dispela.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
Tok Pisin: Long aste avinun, long La Plata, wanpela siti we i stap 50 kilomita (31-pela 'mile') long Buenos Aires, dispela senata (senator) husat em i Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kircher i tokaut olsem em bai i resis long kamap presiden.
English: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast.
Tok Pisin: Ol Sundarbans em ol nambawan bikpela 'littoral mangrove belt' long olgeta hap bilong graun, sais bilong ol em i 80 km (50 mi) i go insait long Bangladeshi na ples i stap insait tru long India longwe long nambis.
English: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
