English: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long 'underwater typology' wara we i kam bek em i bung long ol ples we i dip, na wanpela 'fast current' i go long dispela hap we i dip i ken kamap long hap.
English: The correlation between brain pathology and behaviour supports scientists in their research.
Tok Pisin: Rilesensip namel long 'brain pathology' na pasin i sapotim ol saintis insait long risets bilong ol.
English: In an adoption, the birth parents terminate their parental rights so that another couple may parent the child.
Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela 'adoption', ol papamama we i kamapim dispela pikinini bai stopim 'right' bilong olsem ol papamama na narapela marit i ken lukautim dispela pikinini.
English: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
Tok Pisin: Cyanuric acid na melamine em ol i bin painim ol insait long ol 'sample' bilong pispis bilong ol 'pes' we i bin dai taim ol i kaikai dispela kaikai bilong animal we i posin insait long em.
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Tok Pisin: Plis tingim olsem yu bai lukim wanpela bikpela matmat we ol i planim planti lain long en, tu dispela ples em i gat bikpela mining long planti manmeri long dispela graun.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Wanpela 'safari' bilong wokabaut (ol i save kolim tu olsem wanpela "'bush walk'", "hiking safari", o 'going "'footing'") em i pasin bilong wokabaut, long sampela aua o long sampela de.
predictions: "Waliking safari" (olsem bilong kalabus "bush walk", "hiking safari", o "footing") em i saving hiking, bikpela haus bilong tupla haus bilong samting tupla samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting samting sam

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Also blogging "forces students to become more savvy about the world around them." The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004).
Tok Pisin: Na tu, 'blogging' "i save fosim ol sumatin long save moa long ol samting we i wok long kamap long komuniti we ol i stap long en." Dispela nid long inapim nid bilong ol lain i ritim blog bilong ol i mekim na ol sumatin i gat moa save na kamap 'interesting' (Toto, 2004).
English: All these things and more highlight Ontario as what is considered quintessentially Canadian by outsiders.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain long autsait i tok olsem olgeta dispela samting na sampela moa i soim Ontario olsem em i ples we i soim tru tru kala bilong Canada.
English: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
Tok Pisin: Dispela namba bilong ol manmeri we i stap long dispela taim em i bikpela tru olsem na olgeta lain i no inap long go insait long dispela funerel we i wok long kamap insait long St. Peter's Square.
English: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. It can be rolled into tiny shapes.
Tok Pisin: Gol em ol i ken mekim i go kama kainkain seip (shape). Na ol i ken rolim em na kamapim ol liklik liklik seip (shape).
English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
Tok Pisin: Ol kalsa bilong bipo tru na ol 'tribe' i stat long lukautim ol long mekim isi long kisim milk, gras, mit na skin bilong ol.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Paralympics bai i kamap long 24 Ogas i go long 5 Septemba 2021. Sampela ol samting bai kamap long ol narapela lokesen long ol narapela ples long Japan.
predictions: Paralimpiks i save kamap long wanpela taim: 24 August tasol 5 September 2021. Mani wanpela iet i stap long oli lain loke bilong Japan.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Argentina is well known for having one of the best polo teams and players in the world.
Tok Pisin: Planti lain i save long Argentina olsem em i gat wanpela bilong ol nambawan 'polo team' na ol 'polo player' long olgeta hap bilong graun.
English: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
Tok Pisin: Chambers, wanpela man we i no bilip long God, i tok pait olsem kot pepa bilong bilong em, em i "no bikpela samting" na "olgeta man i ken kisim narapela i go long kot."
English: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i laspela geim (game) bilong ol All Blacks, husat i bin winim pinis dispela 'trophy' long tupela wik i go pinis.
English: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.
Tok Pisin: Bipo planti fama (farmer) i save mekim 'subsistence agriculture' na dispela pasin em i stap yet long planti kantri we i no divelop yet.
English: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, yu mas sekim olsem yu kolim 'r' na 'rr' narakain: 'caro' em i min olsem dia, na 'carro' em i min olsem 'chariot'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Tokyu bai kamap olsem wanpela siti tasol long Asia long hostim tupela sama (summer) Olympics, bikos em i bin hostim ol geim (game) long 1964.
predictions: Tokyo em i wanpela Asias santing bilong hospis wantaim tu samting bilong Olipis, long 1964, em i hospisim dispela geim (game) long taim bilong samting bilong ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
Tok Pisin: Murray i lusim namba wan 'set' bilong em insait long wanpela 'tie breal' taim tupela man wantaim i kisim olgeta 'serve' insait long dispela 'set'.
English: Saltwater Crocodiles do not actively live in the ocean, their primary habitat is in river estuaries north from Rockhampton.
Tok Pisin: Saltwater Crocodiles i no save stap long solwara olgeta taim, nambawan ples bilong ol long i stap em long ol maus wara we i stap long hap not long Rockhampton.
English: The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'sultan' bilong Morocco i bildim dispela siti gen olsem Daru l-Badya na ol treida (trader) bilong Spain i kolim em olsem Casablanca taim ol i mekim ol senta bilong ol long hap.
English: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
Tok Pisin: Ol piksa we ol i kisim wantaim 'infrared' lait i soim olsem senis we i kamap long temprita (temperature) long de na nait i soim olsem dispela ol ples em ol hul bilong ston.
English: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong flai long balus em i ken wanpela ekspiriens wei mekim ol manmeri i gat kainkain krismas na i kam long kainkain ples i pret, bikpela moa em sapos ol i no bin flai bipo o i bin stap insait long wanpela samting nogut we i kamap long balus bipo.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Sapos yu bin makim taim bilong flai na ples bilong stap long 2020 bipo long ol i tokaut olsem ol i senisim taim, yu bai i stap long wanpela hatpela taim.
predictions: Tok Pisin: Sapos yu kisim yet balus na haus sikis bilong 2020 taim yet i no bin aninit long wanpela posponen, yu kisim yet samting bilong hari bilong yu.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast.
Tok Pisin: Ol Sundarbans em ol nambawan bikpela 'littoral mangrove belt' long olgeta hap bilong graun, sais bilong ol em i 80 km (50 mi) i go insait long Bangladeshi na ples i stap insait tru long India longwe long nambis.
English: For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I
Tok Pisin: Moa long wan tausen yia, dispela lotu bilong ol Kristen i bin bungim ol kantri bilong Europe wantaim, maski ol i gat wanwan tok ples na kastom bilong ol yet.
English: Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.
Tok Pisin: Sampela 'atom' i gat 'unstable nuclei' na dispela em i min olsem ol i save bruk taim yu tasim liklik o i no tasim.
English: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'controller' i luk olsem wanpela 'remote controller' bilong televisen, dispela 'controller' i yusim tupela 'sensors' we i stap klostu long teleiven bilong dispela 'user' long mekim 'trangulate' long 'three dimensional space'.
English: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'high winds', 'excessive precipitation', na 'wildfire' em ol sampela samtinng i ken kamap bikos long weda (weather) nogut, wankain tu em ol 'thunderstorm', 'tornado', 'waterspout', na 'cyclone'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol polisi bilong kenselim (cancel) ol samting i no wankain, tasol stat long pinis bilong Mas planti bilong ol polisi bilong kenselim ol samting we i kamap long koronavaires i no surik i go long Julai 2020, taim ol i bin makim Olympics long kamap.
predictions: Tok Pisin: Kanselim polisi save vari, tasol long lait Mars mos kanselim polisi bilong koronavirus i no ken inap stretim i go long Julai 2020, taim ol Olimpik i bin sanipulim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The term bug is used by entomologists in a formal sense for this group of insects.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'bug' em ol entomolojist (entomologist) i save yusim long toktok long dispela grup bilong ol binatang.
English: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
Tok Pisin: Ol pasin bilong ol lain long Paris bai senis hariap tru sapos yu soim sampela gutpela pasin.
English: Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.
Tok Pisin: Israel i laikim olsem i mas i gat ol militeri (military) i stap long veli long tenpela yia taim ol i sainim dispela agrimen na PA i wanbel long lusim dispela kain pasin bilong yusim militeri long faivpela yia tasol.
English: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.
Tok Pisin: As tingting bilong sains (science) em long painimaut wanem we dispela graun i wok taim ol yusim ol 'scientific method'. Dispela metod (method) i save stiaim planti bilong ol 'scientific research'.
English: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'rip currents' em ol tait bilong solwara we i bruk long nambis na i wok long kam bek, planti taim long wanpela rip o kain samting olsem.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol i tok olsem planti bilong ol tiket bai i stap namel long ¥2,500 na ¥130,000, olsem na mak bilong wanpela nomol tiket bai i kost olsem ¥7,000.
predictions: Tok Pisin: Ol i expectim olsem mostpela tiket bilong hap bilong amaen bilong dispela kain samting i kostim wantaim antap long ¥2,500 na ¥130,000, long wanpela samting nabaut ¥7,000.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Subcultures bring together like-minded individuals who feel neglected by societal standards and allow them to develop a sense of identity.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'subculture' i save mekim ol lain i gat wankain tingting na i pilim olsem ol stendet bilong 'society' i no bilong ol na taim ol i bung wantaim ol i kamapim wanpela 'identity' bilong ol yet.
English: It states that the most effective place for the main subject is at the intersection of lines dividing the image into thirds vertically and horizontally (see example).
Tok Pisin: Em i tok olsem gutpela ples bilong wanpela sabjek (subject) long i stap long taim bilong kisim foto em long ples we ol lain i brukim piksa i go long tripela hap 'vertically' na 'horizontally' (lukim eksampel).
English: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
Tok Pisin: Ol leta bilong tingim em 'c' na 'g', bikos 'pronunciation' bilong ol i save senis bihainim 'vowel' we i kam bihain long ol.
English: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'high winds', 'excessive precipitation', na 'wildfire' em ol sampela samtinng i ken kamap bikos long weda (weather) nogut, wankain tu em ol 'thunderstorm', 'tornado', 'waterspout', na 'cyclone'.
English: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
Tok Pisin: 'Duty free shopping' em i sans long baim ol samting we yu no inap long baim takis na 'excises' long sampela lokesen.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Pasin bilong ainim (iron) ol wet klos i ken helpim ol long drai. Planti ol hotel i gat ain na bod bilong ain i stap bilong yusim, maski sapos wanpela ain i no i stap ples klia insait long rum.
predictions: Tok Pisin: Kaikai samting bilong wanpela samting bilong kisim kalsa bilong en i helpim ol i drai. Many hotel i save gat wanpela 'iron' na 'ironing board' bilong lainim, bilong wanpela no inap stap long sapos i no inap stap long sampela samting bilong kisim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
Tok Pisin: Long ol liklik ailan na ol raunwara, yu bai no inap nidim wanpela 'yatch'.
English: However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, draiva bilong kar i kisim ol bikpela bagarap long het.
English: Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species.
Tok Pisin: I go i go, na bihain long sampela tausen o milien yia, dispela tupela populesen bai luk narakain olgeta bai ol lain i no tok olsem ol i wanpela 'specie'.
English: These theories suggest that people have certain needs and/or desires which have been internalized as they mature to adulthood.
Tok Pisin: Ol dispela 'theory' i tok olsem ol manmeri i gat sampela samting ol i nidim na laikim we i stap insait long ol taim ol i kamap bikpela.
English: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'medical charity' Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres na the World Health Organisation i tok olsem dispela em i 'outbreak' we i stap long mak nogut tru insait long dispela kantri.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: If an iron isn't available, or if you don't fancy wearing ironed socks, then you can try using a hairdryer, if available.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Sapos wanpela ain i no i stap, o sapos yu no tingting long werim soks we ol i ainim, orait yu ken traim yusim wanpela 'hairdryer', sapos em i stap.
predictions: Tok Pisin: Em i no inap, o tasol yu no laikim wanpela 'iron' long kisim, na yu kisim samting olsem hairedrai avalabel, na yu kisim gut long triim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
Tok Pisin: Em i no makim wanpela namba bilong mak we dispela bai i kam daun long en, na em i tok olsem ol bai mekim dispela bihainim hamas mani China i mekim.
English: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.
Tok Pisin: As tingting bilong sains (science) em long painimaut wanem we dispela graun i wok taim ol yusim ol 'scientific method'. Dispela metod (method) i save stiaim planti bilong ol 'scientific research'.
English: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.
Tok Pisin: Long presentesen bilong Fonde long Tokyo Game show, presiden bilong Nintendo Satoru Iwata i presentim wanpela 'controller design' bilong kampani long nupela geim (game) bilong em Nintendo Revolution.
English: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'high winds', 'excessive precipitation', na 'wildfire' em ol sampela samtinng i ken kamap bikos long weda (weather) nogut, wankain tu em ol 'thunderstorm', 'tornado', 'waterspout', na 'cyclone'.
English: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
Tok Pisin: Dispela pasin em i kam long Chain we ol i save lukluk long ol 'plum blossom'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Yu mas lukaut long no ken larim laplap i kamap hot tumas (dispela i ken kamapim mekim klos i kamap liklik, o sapos em i hot tumas, klos bai i paia).
predictions: Kuimakim, nao long no allowim samting bilong kain kain kapa i kamap tu hot (em i save kisim samting bilong kisim kain kain samting bilong shrinkage, o long kaikai long kaikai bilong kain kain samting bilong extreme cases).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'courier' kampani em ol i save baim ol gut long bringim ol samting hariap. Planti taim, em i impoten long mekim dispela wantaim ol dokumen bilong bisnis, ol 'merchandise' o 'spare parts' long mekim wanpela ripea (repair) hariap.
English: Several people verified the discovery using different hardware and software by the beginning of February and it was announced on Tuesday.
Tok Pisin: Sampela lain i bin yusim ol kainkain 'hardware' na 'software' long stat nilong Febueri long sekim sapos dispela em i stret na ol i tokaut long dispela long Tunde.
English: Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.
Tok Pisin: Israel i laikim olsem i mas i gat ol militeri (military) i stap long veli long tenpela yia taim ol i sainim dispela agrimen na PA i wanbel long lusim dispela kain pasin bilong yusim militeri long faivpela yia tasol.
English: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
Tok Pisin: Long 1956 Slania i muv i go long Sweden, tripela yia bihain em i stat wok long Swedish Post Office na kamap olsem 'chief engraver' bilong ol.
English: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain Egypt i bildim long 'third century' BCE, Great Pyramid em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela pyramid straksa we ol i wokim long givim ona long wanpela Pharaoh we i dai pinis.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: I gat ol kainkain we bilong mekim wara i kamap 'pure', sampela i save mekim wok bilong daunim sampela kain samting we i ken kamapim hevi.
predictions: Ol i save wokim wanpela kainkain pasin bilong kalsait wara, sampela moa effective long kisim wanpela samting bilong kalsait.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The presence of a true “invisible team” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) is also a unique component of a virtual team.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela trupela “'invisible team'” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) em i wanpela narakain samting i stap insait long ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa.
English: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.
Tok Pisin: Long 'savaana', em i hat long wanpela 'primate' we i gat wanpela 'digestive system' kain olsem bilong ol man long inapim ol 'amino-acid' long ol plent (plant) i stap long hap.
English: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, lukaut long ol smel we i save pulim ol bea na ol narapela animal, olsem na no ken karim o kukim kaikai we i gat strongpela smel na mekim kem i stap klin.
English: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.
Tok Pisin: Long September 17, 1939, ol difens (defence) bilong ol Poland em i bruk, na wanpela samting tasol bilong mekim em long go bek na bung gen long 'bridgehead' bilong Romania.
English: Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far.
Tok Pisin: Ol i kisim bek sampela bilong ol lain we em i holimpasim i stap na sikspela bilong ol dispela lain em ol i dai.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Long sampela eria boilim wara long wanpela minit em i inap, long ol narapela eria yu bai nid long boilim wara long sampela minit.
predictions: Long sampela kantri, boilim wara long wanpela minut em i gen, long ol yet samting, planti wanpela taim em i lukim gut.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In 1884, Tesla moved to the United States of America to accept a job with the Edison Company in New York City.
Tok Pisin: Long 1884, Telsa i muv i go long United States of America long wok wantaim Edison Company long New York City.
English: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.
Tok Pisin: Chaco rijen i gat ol narapela grup bilong ol asples manmeri kain olsem ol Guaycurú na Payaguá, husat i save painim abus, pis na bungim ol kaikai ol i painim long bus.

Tok Pisin: Straksa bilong ol dispela gras bilong pisin i soim olsem wok bilong ol em i no bilong flai tasol em i bilong mekim tempritsa (temperature) bilong bodi bilong ol i stap gut na bilong soim kala bilong ol long ol narapela. Ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i ting olsem, maski dispela em i tel bilong wanpela yangpela dainaso, dispela 'sample' i soim gras bilong wanpela bikpela dainaso na i no gras bilong wanpela pikinini dainaso.
English: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu kam autsait long 'current', pasin bilong swim i go bek em bai i no inap hat long mekim.
English: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i no save bilong wanem na ol mobail fon sevis i strong moa long hia na i no strong long planti ol narapela hap bilong dispela rot, kain olsem Pennsylvania Wilds.
English: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong yusim vidio rekoding i mekim na ol saveman i painimaut long ol impoten samting long sait bilong mining bilong 'micro-expression', ol muvmen bilong pes we i save kamap insait long sampela 'millisecond'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
Tok Pisin: Maski dispela em i wanpela 'stereotype' we i no stret, nambawan we long stap long Paris em long mekim ol gutpela pasin, ekt olsem wanpela man o meri husat i "bien élevé" (papamama bilong em i skulim em gut). Em bai mekim isi long i go i kam long Paris.
English: The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris.
Tok Pisin: United States Strategic Command bilong U.S Department of Defense ofis i wok long painim na makim ol hap hap pat we i stap yet.
English: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long dispela, tupela 'specie' bilong pis i pinis olgeta, na tupela narapela em klostu i laik pinis olgeta, wanpela bilong ol em i 'humpback chub'.
English: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP).
Tok Pisin: Karensi (currancy) bilong Falkland em Falkland pound (FKP) we velu bilong em i wankain olsem wanpela British pound (GBP).
English: There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol toilet bilong bipotaim tru long Egypt, Persia na China. Long hap bilong ol Rome, ol toilet em ol i stap olsem hap bilong ol pablik haus bilong waswas we ol man na meri i save bung wantaim.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
Tok Pisin: Sampela ripot i tok olsem namba bilong ol lain i dai em i et, na ripot i kam long ol ofis i tok olsem 30-pela lain i kisim bagarap; tasol tru tru namba em ol i no save yet.
English: Neurobiological data provide physical evidence for a theoretical approach to the investigation of cognition. Therefore it narrows the research area and makes it much more exact.
Tok Pisin: Neurobiological infomesen i givim evidens (evidence) long wanpela 'theoretical approach' long investigesen bilong 'cognition'. Olsem na em i mekim eria bilong risets i kamap liklik moa na mekim em i kamap long 'exact'.
English: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
Tok Pisin: 'Boating' o pasin bilong raun long bot em i wanpela samting we olgeta manmeri long Finland i save laik long mekim. Ol i gat planti bot, wanpela bot em i inap long 7-pela o 8-pela manmeri.
English: Two popular content theories are Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs Theory and Hertzberg's Two Factor Theory.
Tok Pisin: Tupela 'content theory' we planti lain i save long en em Hierarchy of Needs Theory na Hertzberg's Two Factor Theory.

Tok Pisin: Taim Federal Government i kam na i kisim ol mani bilong Mersey haus sik long Devonport, long Tasmania, gavman bilong dispela 'state' na ol sampela MP bilong gavman i tok strong olsem dispela pasim em i trik bilong redi long ileksen we bai kamap long Novemba.

Tok Pisin: Maski planti bilong ol kaiki bilong ol em mipela i ken save, ol Rom i gat ol kaikai we yumi i no save long en o ol save yusim long taim bilong bikpela bung kaikai, wanpela em wel pik, 'peacock', 'snail', na wanpela kain rat ol i kolim 'dormouse'.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
Tok Pisin: Websait we i save givim nius long sait bilong 'entertainment' TMZ i save olsem dispela man bilong kisim foto i stopim kar bilong em long narapela sait bilong Sepulveda Boulevard na i wok long traim long kisim ol piksa bilong ol polis i stopim kar na bihain em i go long narapela sait bilong rot na i kontinu (continue) long kisim foto, dispela i mekim na California Highway Patrol polis ofisa husat i wok long stopim ol kar i givim oda long em tupela taim long em i mas go bek.
English: In an adoption, the birth parents terminate their parental rights so that another couple may parent the child.
Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela 'adoption', ol papamama we i kamapim dispela pikinini bai stopim 'right' bilong olsem ol papamama na narapela marit i ken lukautim dispela pikinini.
English: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."
Tok Pisin: Long wanpela intaviu, em i tok olsem dispela nupela 'variant' i bin "kamapim bikpela hevi na pret bikos long planti manmeri i dai."
English: The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says.
Tok Pisin: Long taim bilong winta (winter) ples i ken kol nogut tru: ol tempritsa (temperature) i no save go daun aninit long mak we ais i save kamap, tasol i win na wara i stap long win i save bung wantaim long mekim ples i pilim kol moa long wanem samting 'thermometer' i tok.
English: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
Tok Pisin: Ol wanwan hap bilong stori em ol i soim antap long o 'pyramid' na ol i save mekim lait i kamap long ol kainkain 'pyramid'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.
Tok Pisin: Germany em i stap olsem birua bilong planti lain long World War 2, dispela i mekim na wok bung i kamap namel long USSR na USA. Taim woa i pinis, bam i kamap namel long ol sistem, ol proses (process) na kalsa na dispela i mekim ol kantri i no wok wantaim.
English: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
Tok Pisin: Kain olsem 60-pela ripot bilong ol iPods we i no wok gut biko ol i hot tumas i bin kamap, dispela i kamap sikspela paia olgeta na mekim paia i kukim foapela lain na ol i gat 'minor burns'.
English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i save wok stap olsem man o meri we i save bungim ol grup we i wok wantaim long ofis.
English: Foster care is supposed to provide all the necessities that were lacking in the home they were previously taken from.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'foster care' i sapos long givim olgeta samting we ol i no bin gat long haus we ol i kisim ol long en.
English: It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.
Tok Pisin: Em i klostu long hat olgeta long senisim karensi (currency) bilong Falkland autsait long ol ailan, olsem na yu mas senisim mani bipo long yu lusim dispela ailan.

predictions: Yupela mas tratim ples bilong yu wantaim ol kisim digni, samting bilong kisim siksom na kisim respect we i mas kisim. No kisim stori bilong Holocaust o Nazis.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'curry' em i wanpela kaikai we i yusim ol 'herb' na 'spice', wantaim ol abus o kumu.
English: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system.
Tok Pisin: Ol siti bilong Harappa na Mohenjo-daro i gat wanpela toilet we i yusim wara long klostu olgeta haus, naol i join i go long wanpela narapela kain 'sewage system'.
English: Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.
Tok Pisin: Israel i laikim olsem i mas i gat ol militeri (military) i stap long veli long tenpela yia taim ol i sainim dispela agrimen na PA i wanbel long lusim dispela kain pasin bilong yusim militeri long faivpela yia tasol.
English: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts".
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken mekim em i kama bun na liklik nogut tru na stikim (stick) em i go long ol narapela metel (metal). Sampela taim ol i ken mekim em i kama bun nogut tru na yusim em long bilasim ol piksa we ol peintim (paint) long han na insait long buk we ol i kolim "illuminated manuscripts".
English: At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela taim wanpela man insait long ol bikpela lain manmeri i apim na soim het bilong wanpela 'royal guard' we ol i bin kilim long Versailles long fran bilong Queen na em i pret nogut tru.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela topik we dispela ripot i toktok long en, em mak bilong Jerusalem we i stap olsem ples holi long tupela kantri wantaim na hevi bilong Jordan Valley.
English: In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts.
Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela yia, wanpela man o meri we i sik wantaim dispela binatang i ken givim dispela sik i go long 10 o 15-pela lain we i save stap klostu long ol.
English: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
Tok Pisin: 'Backpacking by ski': Dispela ektiviti em ol i save kolim tu olsem 'backcountry ski', 'ski touring' o 'ski hiking'.
English: For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I
Tok Pisin: Moa long wan tausen yia, dispela lotu bilong ol Kristen i bin bungim ol kantri bilong Europe wantaim, maski ol i gat wanwan tok ples na kastom bilong ol yet.
English: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
Tok Pisin: Krismas em i wanpela bilong ol impoten holide bilong Christianity, na ol i save amamasim dispela de olsem bonde bilong Jisas.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long ol soldia i kam kamap, Haiti i no bin i gat problem long sait bilong sik stat long ol yia insait long 1800 i kam inap nau.
English: There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.
Tok Pisin: I luk olsem bai i gat moa 'maria' long sait i stap klostu bikos 'crust' em i 'thin' moa. Em i isi moa long 'lava' long kam antap long autsait.
English: For news on tournaments and where to buy tickets for polo matches, check Asociacion Argentina de Polo.
Tok Pisin: Long nius long ol tonamen (tournament) na wanem hap bilong baim tiket long ol polo geim (game), sekim Asociacion Argentina de Polo.
English: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
Tok Pisin: Long ol nupela de bilong em, dispela 'show' i save kamap long redio bilong intanet TogiNet Radio, dispela em i wanpela websait we i save gat ol toktok bilong redio long en.
English: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
Tok Pisin: Tupelal singsing bilong dispela muvi, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) na City of Stars, em ol i makim olsem 'best original song'. Ol i makim Lionsgate studio 26-pela taim—dispela em i moa long olgeta narapela 'studio'.

English: For example, the most common still image photography format in the world is 35mm, which was the dominant film size at the close of the analog film era.

English: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.
Tok Pisin: Oyapock River Bridge em i wanpelad 'cable-stayed bridge'. Em i stap long Oyapock River na konektim ol siti bilong Oiapoque insait long Brazil na Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock insait long French Guiana.

English: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, Ring i bin givim mani long wanpela sekuriti kampani, ADT Corporation, we i bin laik kisim em i go long kot.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler.
Tok Pisin: I gat planti ol samting i kamap long 'society' na 'politics' kain olsem pasin bilong yusim 'metric system'. na senis long 'absolutism' i go long 'republicanism', na pasin bilong 'nationalism' na bilip long kantri em i samting bilong ol manmeri na i no bilong wanpela man tasol we i bosim ol.
English: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wok painimaut i givim sampela tingting tu long wanem we gras bilong pisin i save kamap.
English: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela gutpela eksampel we i kamap i no longtaim em dispela kempen (campaign) bilong North Altlantic long WWII. Ol America i wok long traim long muvim ol kago na ol man long Atlantic Ocean long helpim ol Britain.
English: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela tritmen we i yusim ol 'antibody', nem bilong em ZMapp, i bin soim olsem em i ken oraitim sik, tasol bihain long ol stadi i kamap, ol i painimaut olsem em i no inap long banisim ol manmeri long i dai long rot we ol i bin tingim long en.
English: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'pest' i ken bagarapim kaikai, mekim skin i skrap, o nogut moa ol i ken kamapim ol 'allergic reaction', spredim 'venom', o mekim sik i kalap long wanpela man i go long narapela.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
Tok Pisin: Dispela liklik ples Haldarsvík em yu ken stap long em na lukluk i go long ailan bilong Eysturoy we i stap klostu na em i gat wanpela narapela kain sios we seip (shape) bilong em i olsem 'octagon'.
English: To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite.
Tok Pisin: Long kisim ol gutpela hap bilong lukim Hong Kong, lusim ailan na go long fran bilong wara long Kowloon long hapsait.
English: You can also have alloys that include small amounts of non-metallic elements like carbon.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken i gat ol 'alloy' we i gat ol liklik mak bilong ol elemen (element) we i no metel (metal) kain olsem 'carbon' insait long ol.
English: Some people thought he was right but many people believed the opposite; that the Solar System moved around the Earth, including the Sun (and even the other stars).
Tok Pisin: Ol sampela manmeri i ting olsem em i tok stret, tasol planti manmeri i bilim long oposit (opposite); ol i bilip olsem Solar System i save muv raunim Earth, wantaim Sun (na ol narapela sta tu).
English: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'shooter' insait long dispela 'supplementary pest control' test em ol 'ranger' i was long ol, bikos dispela test em ol i monitarim (monitor) na skelim 'effectiveness' bilong em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.
Tok Pisin: Bipo planti fama (farmer) i save mekim 'subsistence agriculture' na dispela pasin em i stap yet long planti kantri we i no divelop yet.
English: Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife.
Tok Pisin: Madagascar em i wanpela bikpela tru, na em i kain olsem wanpela kontinen (continent) bilong em, taim yumi lukluk long sait bilong 'wildlife'.
English: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.
Tok Pisin: Chaco rijen i gat ol narapela grup bilong ol asples manmeri kain olsem ol Guaycurú na Payaguá, husat i save painim abus, pis na bungim ol kaikai ol i painim long bus.
English: The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambawan samting we i soim olsem 'internal poisoning' i kamap em wanpela kontena bilong marasin o 'toxic chemical' bilong haus i op na i stap.
English: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'safari' bilong wokabaut (ol i save kolim tu olsem wanpela "'bush walk'", "hiking safari", o 'going "'footing'") em i pasin bilong wokabaut, long sampela aua o long sampela de.

English: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Maski dispela em i wanpela 'stereotype' we i no stret, nambawan we long stap long Paris em long mekim ol gutpela pasin, ekt olsem wanpela man o meri husat i "bien élevé" (papamama bilong em i skulim em gut). Em bai mekim isi long i go i kam long Paris.
predictions: Olsem wanpela samting we i no sios long ples, tasol yet olsem wanpela samting bilong kisim gutpela samting long Pariz, em i kisim gut samting bilong yu pasim samting bilong yu yet, tasol i stap gutpela pasin bilong yu, bilong wokabaut olsem wanpela manmeri bilong wanpela samting bilong ol i "bien élevé" (well brought up). Bai yu kisim gutpela samting bilong yu long kisim gut long wokabaut.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report "truly regrettable."
Tok Pisin: Dispela ministri i autim tingting bilong em taim em i kolim dispela pasin bilong Apple long i no givim ripot hariap olsem "i no gutpela tru."
English: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.
Tok Pisin: Ol i stopim ol raun bilong ol bihain long 'lead singer' bilong ol Steven Tyler i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong em taim em i pundaun i kamdaun long 'stage' taim em i wok long singsing long Ogas 5.
English: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
